entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: To have no regrets…

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: The gift of a sliver of hope. To find true understanding. To stand by each other. Now, and in the aftermath.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: Time is precious. Inevitable calamity ticks closer to you. To reconcile before an ending.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: To be weary. To know millennia of duty and of loss. To do what-must-be-done to fulfil end again.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: To sacrifice my homeworld… to do what-must-be-done. To forsake who?

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: To trust them with the remnants of the Acrin people.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: To be reduced to beggars and wanderers… to know who still shelters us?

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: To welcome kindred spirits.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Draws near, time shrinks. To not waste it.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: To welcome.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: To know that you think I could be otherwise. To feel thankful for that.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: To be the remnants of a lost crusade against you. To still help us. To wonder: why Voice thinks humanity evil?

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: To accept any scrap.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: To know, easy. To lack wisdom. though… to be your downfall.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: To one day trust each other freely. To accept, in the knowledge of future amity.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: To not expect your trust… to do it to have your cooperation.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptPeace
entry.value: To this. To know desire for peace.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: To accept. To be an arbiter like you…

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: To meditate, while you build harmony. To ask… who pities us?

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptPraise
entry.value: To know vindication in the words of another.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptSupport/AcceptType
entry.value: To be acceptable. To bless also.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptSupport/AskType
entry.value: To know what. Why. Who for.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: To thank you. To know the Acrin have little. To give you past millennia of gratitude.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: To only know your charity for so long. To thank you for helping Acrin people recover.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: To not understand; to accept wisdom. To thank you.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: To hesitate, every voice must at least be heard. To know who is… alienated?

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: To be accepted, we who failed to exterminate them…? To gladly welcome them.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: To know Acrin brought down by war… to hope to be saved by trade. To know who might exchange with us?

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: To call it fair. To not balance what my people take from you, this world.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: To have nothing… to suppose it’s the same for you. To know amount you are asking?

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: To not be alarmed, to have recalled them. The survivors of my people, to be searching for a better way.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptWar
entry.value: To have hoped for the discovery of a peaceful path… but the universe hangs in the balance and so the Acrin fight.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: To have not forgotten why this is our destination, this, your Earth. To have hope for a different future, you and I must complete our grim quest.

entry.name: Anchorite/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: To yearn for peace. Yet the prophesied threat is never dealth with. To know who, or what, it is…

entry.name: Anchorite/AdmitDefeat
entry.value: To have spent a lifetime studying desert mysteries. To have understood eternal life, power. To have followed a voice across the stars. To have dismantled our lives, our civilisation. To have traveled for eons. To this, this degraded end. To accept this ending with grace and bliss. To thank you.

entry.name: Anchorite/AskForProposals
entry.value: Lifetimes, waited. Answers, now.

entry.name: Anchorite/CancelAction
entry.value: To need a moment… to compose oneself…

entry.name: Anchorite/Condemn
entry.value: To worry at the path you must walk. To such dark lands.

entry.name: Anchorite/Condemn/AgelessHunger
entry.value: To know that death follows you. To know that you could end it yourself.

entry.name: Anchorite/Condemn/Gluttony
entry.value: To understand the motive. The concentration of joy rather than the mitigation of misery. But to disagree with the moral and the result.

entry.name: Anchorite/Condemn/Immoral
entry.value: To know morality, to know suffering, to continue anyway. To see evil in one such as you, even in the absence of true justice.

entry.name: Anchorite/Condemn/InhumanKindness
entry.value: To know temptation, to sup nectar from its palms. To twist, to change, to alter. To not-die, to unbecome. To never travel that path again.

entry.name: Anchorite/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: To see all lies and truths repeated in the cycle of history, of endless rebirth. To see the damage deception does to the spirit beneath.

entry.name: Anchorite/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: To praise peace… to condemn %3%. To know the wheel will turn again.

entry.name: Anchorite/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: To know that few survived our fall. That %3% was the last refuge for many of our kind. To know the suffering they suffered. To strive to be beyond hate, hate of you, our monstrous alien foe.

entry.name: Anchorite/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: To know your betrayal before you do. To set in place the mitigations. To sometimes allow it.

entry.name: Anchorite/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: To be beyond materialism, possession. To yet fear the strengthening of %3%. To catastrophise.

entry.name: Anchorite/CondemnWar
entry.value: To wonder at the waste of life. To see the smallness of %3%'s lifeline. To weep for what might have been.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: To be fascinated. To wonder what it is like, in there, like the Great Enemy. To know that the chance of infection is too high. To purge.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: To not know death. To have lived too long. Yet to have never died. To wonder at death, at its regularity with you. To fear that one must inflict this again, anyway.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: To worry. The voice, mingled with the people of this realm. To see its allure, to know its call. To fear what one might become. To hope, three may join with another, with the great one. To know war, against the day.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: To abhor thee. To know no solace in your empty heart. To know you are essential, even so, to what must come. To fear that, in the absence of fulfillment, you must be removed.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: To admire your commitment to the present. To abhor the present you are creating. To know, for all who live in this space, you must be removed.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: To see your network, your connections. To know that is your value, your richness—not your wealth, not the transient taste of delicacies. To act now, in case your part is not yet fulfilled and you are threat.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: To regret your tangle. To know that disentanglement is not for one such as I. To resort to the Alexandrian technique. To cut.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: To pity. To know however the value of the essence. The refusal to grow. To know IT loves you for that. To wonder if jealousy drives my action?

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: To call you the heart. To fear your resilience should you fail. Essential to what must come, as are all. To bring together. To act against you now, against the day.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: To accept the humor. To think your skills might be considered advanced. To mock with gentle laughter. To know your value is in your hidden self. To act now, to cut off the chance of failure.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: To look at the failure of my people. To see the death of our religion. To hear the cries of wasted life. To know it all in you!

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: To see your wisdom, when you do not. To fear your delusions. To need the former, for what must come, but fear the latter. To act, against the day.

entry.name: Anchorite/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: To express relief. To know, one way or another, rest.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Strife… chaos… to denounce those who promote acrimony?

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: To see bickering over factions, sides; yet the great threat looms still over us all… to know the peril should we all not band together to defeat it?

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: To know my people, the Acrin will gladly assist. But we are sadly ill-equipped.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: To require much convincing.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: To ask a pittance, to survive.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: To ask for all, all that you have.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: To ask you to share. To split what you have with us.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Far from our world, to demand things is unwise—yet peace serves all, men and Acrin.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: To know you are better than this. To sup with the foes of all, to break bread.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: To share what you have with another will multiply it. Not ancient wisdom, present practicality.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandTribute
entry.value: To think that I am worthy of something—some sign of esteem.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: In your eyes, to suspect that I am highly valued.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: To know that I am but a small of your view of this world and to be accomodated commensurately.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: To give up all you have, so you are like I was, in the desert with naught.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: To share with me your wealth exactly. To show our equality.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: To know our presence is abhorrent. To request your armies fall back from our small holdings.

entry.name: Anchorite/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: There is one—one who is inimical to what must come. Do what you must against them.

entry.name: Anchorite/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: To perish… I know you are responsible for the future of my people.

entry.name: Anchorite/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: To take care of the path you tread. The Acrin people were ruined by conceit.

entry.name: Anchorite/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: To never forget—a grave threat grew on this planet, to call Acrin across time and space to fail to prevent it.

entry.name: Anchorite/FirstContact
entry.value:
Merciful potentate… War divides us, yes, but to beg a moment.

To be the eldest remaining of Acrin. To follow prophecy and bring cleansing torch to your world. To all life remains the threat. To know our failure. To now face extinction.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferAlliance
entry.value: To live for longer than your race… yet to still admire you. To hope we build this world together, anew.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferGift
entry.value: The Acrin people are close to annihilation… yet to help, we still wish.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: To know this gift is much… but to not prioritize our survival over the universe.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: This, all to gather together. To hope it is enough.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: To give all. To know that not enough to alter our mistakes or atone.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: To give more, to you… the successor to our purpose.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: To wander scouts far and wide, knowing the hidden menace. To help us examine their findings?

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace
entry.value: To beg you! To settle our conflict and to focus on the real adversary!

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: You are not like the others, not judgemental. To recognise your difference, first step to recognise your place in world. I to help.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: To know your suffering, for you people—to worry for my own. To beg for calm.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: You do not need condemnation. To need healing. To know the Voice turns the mind inward and changes the body in its absence. I see the marks—let us be at peace, so I can help.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: To tempt with wisdom. The soft caves of my youth were sculpted so by winds from the desert, bearing sharp sand. You, to appreciate the forms, the texture.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: To see when a request is futile. To make it anyway.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: My Acrin would rather be part of your network, than on the outside dying of hunger. Could you consider peace?

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: To see our world through the same eyes. To hope for the best. To choose to work for it.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: To know contempt for avarice. But to forgive, knowing greed desires property rights and peace is but a step from that.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: To dream, yes, to dream. But the world is what it is, goes where it must. Peace is in the plan.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: To want nothing you have. To have so little ourself. To muse… perhaps your wars will be confined to the rich, the powerful?

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: To pity you. To give you time to reflect.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: At long last. One way or another, I will finally rest.

entry.name: Anchorite/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: Help us rebuild, and we will prove our value to you.

entry.name: Anchorite/Praise
entry.value: To know the value of a good act. To know when to praise it.

entry.name: Anchorite/Praise/AnchoriteStanding
entry.value: To send heralds, gifts. To be satisified with the trial's completion. To love beyond time and space.

entry.name: Anchorite/Praise/Mysticism
entry.value: To be a believer, to be wise. To not believe too hard, wiser still.

entry.name: Anchorite/Praise/Undying
entry.value: To know that you are chosen, blessed. To not have seen such integrity of rebirth in ten aeons of life. To wonder.

entry.name: Anchorite/Praise/WordsOfTheProphet
entry.value: To see a diamond grain amongst the sand. To see the truth amidst your mistakes. To wonder.

entry.name: Anchorite/PraiseWar
entry.value: To know this is inevitable. To see it as your path unfolding, this time. To wish for simpler journeys, each time. To accept the goodness of this… war.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectAlliance
entry.value: You are too focused on wars of false consequence. We must save our forces to fight the ultimate foe.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: How could I ever accept such counsel from a heart so devoid of peace?

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: This world has become our executioner… we cannot lose even a single protector.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: There are so few of us remaining… My apologies, but we cannot risk being drawn into more conflicts.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: An impatient general charges towards loss. When they fight to preserve… then I will reconsider.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: It’s not right. We can’t take more from you… than what we already have.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: Thank you… but do not waste your resources on us. We have all we need and deserve.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: I do not need your maps. Return when you have seen… more of this world.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: No. This just isn’t possible. What you offer is not worth. Risking the safety of my people.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: You do not realize. The folly of your request. No amount amount of profit… is worth extinction.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectPeace
entry.value: Peace is my hope. But I do not forget my purpose. To keep the universe safe. I, and my people, sacrifice everything.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Yet another battle. Yet another sacrifice. We cannot rest… until our task is done.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Sacrifice this one. Save the others. Wait on sorrow until duty is complete… leave only room for conviction.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectSupport
entry.value: To have hungry mouths too. To know sadness at loss.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: What scraps we have left… must be used for salvation. There is nothing left to trade.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Please… do not ask this of me. My people are broken. Every bit of assistance is needed.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: To spurn one who always comes with open hands… I would not be the wisest if I did such a thing.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: When we crashed from the sky, everything was shattered. I’m sorry… we have nothing to exchange.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: We do not yet trust them. To profit with the enemy… is no gain at all.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: Your demand invites doom. Not just for the Acrin. For the universe entirely.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: Even if we had it, we would give you nothing. To harm our mission… is to invite obliteration on yourself.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: No. We are too close to finding our target. You must allow us to continue.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: No. Never again. The Acrin uprooted our entire civilization for the call to war… and it was my people came close to annihilation.

entry.name: Anchorite/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I cannot focus… on another conflict. My body is already dust… held together by my will.

entry.name: Anchorite/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: I am sorry. This is not what I want… I only do what is necessary.

entry.name: Anchorite/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: I am sorry. The roads between us have grown treacherous. My remaining caravans can no longer be risked.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Bailin’ already?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: Glad ah didn't havta ask first. Now let’s celebrate with a few bevvies… and a raid. Yeah?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: Well… damn. Didn't expect that to hurt. Not going to forgive that.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: %3% was always a bit of a bludger… comin’ late to fights but lovin the loot.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I don't have that many friends. Who d'ye want me to cut off?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Always thought %3% was rad! Never thought they’d wanna be mates.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Ya setting me up with… a pal? Quite the matchmaker. Crikey… ya got me curious.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: G’day, %2%! Wanna come over? I was just about to scratch a runner!

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Piss off, wanker! Or better yet, tell me where ya are.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Oh! %2%! Wait a tick, let me get the boys—ya came here for a fight, right?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: Hahahahaha. Oh, shit, wait. You're serious? Ahahaha!

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Ya know… people don’t normally just give me things, not without my, heh, 'ticklin’ ’em. This feels pretty… nice.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: A gift? What, is it Chrissie today? Well I hope ya don’t expect one back, ‘cuz I don’t have one. What ya got me?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: Fair dinkum, share our maps. I don’t want to be sendin’ me scouts into yer territory—and yers wouldn’t last in mine.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Let me think on it real quick… how many guns is this deal gonna cost me? Divide by ten… carry the one… Beauty! I accept!

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: Hmm… a girl like me ain’t sweet enough, so ya sweeten the deal. How much?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptPeace
entry.value: I’ve been fightin’ so long, %2%. I’m buggered. Let’s rest for a bit, we can always go again after we’ve both had some shut-eye.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: %3%… So that sook went runnin’ to ya. Fine, I’ll offer it—but only because I respect ya.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Hmm, maybe. Who’s it and how close is their jugular?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptPraise
entry.value: Are you butterin' me up? Do you want a piece of this? This ain't a dating app, cully.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptSupport/AcceptType
entry.value: Fair's fair. I can do that. Just don't look so surprised.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptSupport/AskType
entry.value: You? Need MY help? Haw haw. What kind?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: Yer sharpen me blade, I’ll sharpen yers. That how it goes? Whatever, I’m tryin’ to say yes.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: Wait, really? Does this mean I can go back to robbin’ ya?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Stop trade with %3%? I can agree to that, felt more like theft than tradin’ anyways.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Maybe. Not all deals are worth keepin’—especially the one-sided ones. Who d’yer want me to cut off?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Always admired %3%. Could never get away with stealin’ from ’em and raidin’ always cost me too much in blood. So sure, let’s try tradin’.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Depends, who d’ya have in mind? And don’t tell me to trade for something I can easily take.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Alright, alright, I accept. Just remember this later—'cause I sure will.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: I may be young, but I know robbery. Now how much ya demandin’?

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Me mates get a little too close for ya? Heh. Sorry-not-sorry.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptWar
entry.value: Honestly, this is kinda a relief. Always thought it’d be yew and me in the end, scrappin’ for the prize. Watch yer back, cause I’m comin’ for ya.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Heh, sounds fun. I was gettin’ bored anyway.

entry.name: Chieftess/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Don't need to ask a scorpion to sting. Who? And why?

entry.name: Chieftess/AdmitDefeat
entry.value:
Well… they got me. No hard feelings, ya was just tougher.

Here, could you… do me with me own knife? And, when I'm, uh… gone. Could ya be a mate and keep ’er sharp? Okay?

Now. End it. Don't keep a lady waitin’…

… the lady's me, by the way.

entry.name: Chieftess/AskForProposals
entry.value: Well? Did ya wanna waste more of my time?

entry.name: Chieftess/CancelAction
entry.value: Yer wastin’ me time.

entry.name: Chieftess/Condemn
entry.value: Shit, mate. What the fuck are you up to?

entry.name: Chieftess/Condemn/HeartfeltLoss
entry.value: Don't sweat the small stuff, cully. 'Ooh, me men are all dead, curse me poetic soul.' Boo-hoo, yer lily-livered fucktart!

entry.name: Chieftess/Condemn/TheSureThing
entry.value: Sure thing? Where's the fun in that, ya pasty-faced office vamp? It's the gamble that makes life life—never knowing who's gonna be tearing out whose throat with whose teeth!

entry.name: Chieftess/Condemn/Trapped
entry.value: There's a world out here, to rob and kill, and there's you, hiding from me behind those ivory walls. Come out and play.

entry.name: Chieftess/Condemn/Undying
entry.value: Bit of a cheat, mate. That whole not-dying thing. Don't like that one bit. How the boys meant to stick ya, if you won't stay stuck?!

entry.name: Chieftess/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: Yer worse than me! At least shoot in 'em in the front, in the head. Make it quick.

entry.name: Chieftess/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: Peace? Ya got peace with %3%? Are you just ugly, or ugly and stupid?

entry.name: Chieftess/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: What the FUCK. I had some good shit in %3%. Some of my last Great Crisp tinnies! And friends too. FUCK!

entry.name: Chieftess/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: Oh, no, fucker. You DON'T do that. Next time you think about messing with my pals, think again.

entry.name: Chieftess/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: Oh, no. You're sending your riches across the wastelands to %3%? I swear that a bunch of raggedy-ass reavers ain't gonna be waiting…

entry.name: Chieftess/CondemnWar
entry.value: If you're gonna kill someone, why %3%? I wanted to do them myself.

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: Time to take ya out to the long yard, grandpa!

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: Well. This a new level of awkward. But if yer me, then we should both wanna get straight to cuttin’ each other up, yeah?

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Let's be honest, I don't need a reason to fight ya. Consider this message me bein' polite, rather than findin' me knife in ya mainframe.

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Hear yer a hard one to kill. Let's have a go then!

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: G'day! Not listening to your tosh and babble t'day! Came here for a fight!

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Hello, wanker. We're at war. Thought I'd make it loud and clear, cuz I know ya's a bit airy-fairy.

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Fucking asshole! Remember that night out! Pin the tail on the Acrin? You NOTCHED my fucking KNIFE. Fucker! Gonna get you.

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Yer people grow fat while mine grow lean. It’s time for a cullin’.

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Keep your paws off! Don't you smile at me! You're dead, you hear, dead!

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Nice watch. And tchotchkes too. All mine, soon.

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: G'day, wanker. Sorry I didn't write a poem, but how's this: I just came. To Say. I hate youuu. And we're now at war!' Whaddya think? Gonna win Eurovision?

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: Oi, you, sneaky tosser. I prefer boogers hands where I can see 'em. Anyway, I'm gonna cut yours off, goddit? It's WAR!

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: Sheila! Get the kids outta way! I'm a-comin'!

entry.name: Chieftess/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: G'day kid. Feels like bullyin', but uh, I'm gonna 'avta to kill you and all you love? Hope that's okay, bye!

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Yer as weak as the company ya keep. Cut ’em off and we can carve ’em up.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Ya need more help than I’m willin’ to give. Maybe ya should get some mates.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: Yeah, nah. Gonna need a better offer.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Ya wanna make this happen easy? Well I wanna be paid heaps.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Ya wanna make this happen easy? Then send a little gift.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Ya wanna make this happen easy? Then give me everything ya got.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Ya wanna make this happen easy? Well I wanna be paid.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Yer little pissin’ match is becomin’ a problem. End yer feud or I’ll end ya both.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Better end yer deal. Whatever yer gettin’, it isn’t worth makin’ me mad now right?

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: If ya start sendin’ those caravans, I’ll think twice about raidin ’em.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandTribute
entry.value: Most days, I take what I want. Today I’m askin’—and yer answer better be yes.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Don’t think of this as robbery, but a pricey way to get on me good side.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Don’t think of this as robbery, but a cheap way to get on me good side.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Okay, this time it’s basically robbery. Give me all ya got if ya wanna stay on me good side.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Don’t think of this as robbery, but a way to get on me good side.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Back off unless yer serious. Me mates are just itchin’ for blood.

entry.name: Chieftess/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: G’day, mate. So I’m hostin’ a barbie. It’s BYOA—Bring Yer Own Army. Plenty of fun, plenty of spoils. Will ya invite all yer mates and come?

entry.name: Chieftess/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Hoo roo, mate.

entry.name: Chieftess/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Watch yer back, wimp.

entry.name: Chieftess/FirstContact
entry.value:
G'day, dead meat. Enjoying fighting ma boys?

See while you saps were hidin' in yer tunnels and hobbit holes, we lived through it up 'ere. Changes ya, that. Death marches, plagues, massacres, starvation. Do whatever ya can ta live.

What I mean is. Yer seem nice. But I can't promise I won't EVER stab ya… World bein’ what it is, chances are yer’ll be stabbed at some point anyway—so why not by me?

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferAlliance
entry.value: Yer a bloody mad dog! What d’yer reckon we be mates and carve up this world between us?

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferGift
entry.value: Today I’m gonna offer ya somethin’—and ya can’t say no. No, no, that’s not a threat—this time. Wait, I reckon that just sounded like a threat too? Ugh. Here. Just take it.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: Here. Big pile of moolah, happy now?

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: Don’t whinge! I rarely give anyone anything so ya better treasure it.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: Look… ya can whinge all yer want, but this is all I got.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: Here’s a fair bit, so no whingin’—agreed?

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: We should share our maps. I don’t want yer soldiers meddlin’ in me turf—and ya don’t want me mates roamin’ around yers.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace
entry.value: Look… this is rare of me. Please, if ya wanna stay healthy, just shut up and accept.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: So, uh, this war thing isn't working out for me. That big zapper on your city? Not much fun to be at the other end. Quits?

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Okay, you really won't die, wilya? Can we have a break while I get some new ideas?

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Look, I know you can see the future… did you know this was comin'? Me comin' ta you, beggin' for peace? Well, I ain't gonna beg. But…

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Phew-ee. You value your people even less than I like mine! I can't compete.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Damn, boy. You fight like Beezlebub's pup! Gimme a moment to catch my breath.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: I'm tired o' killin' ya. Gonna have a break for a bit, sharpen some things.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Gramps. I hear you seen the future. If I stop killing ya, d'ya think… ya could give me next week's lottery numbers?

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Liking the gladrags, boy. Here's a deal: I stop killing your pals. You get a nice dress made in size 14, we do dinner. You pay.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value:
Don't take this the wrong way, but, uh… do you have any poetry I could borrow? All this killin's made put me in touch with my sensitive side.

(I'm going ta kill ya later, instead. Definitely.)

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: Listen, I'm runnin' low on Reavers. Need to go do some recruitin', gonna havta leave murdering yew for another day. Cool?

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Huh. Didn't guess you'd be tough as nails. Good on ya.

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Hey kid, sorry about the atrocities and the churches we burned and so on. Been thinking, I might go pillage someone else for a bit. Give you a break, seein' as you is a kid. Cheers!

entry.name: Chieftess/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: Ya been raidin’ me caravans just as I’ve done yers. What say we cut out the unnecessary work and just send them to each other?

entry.name: Chieftess/Praise
entry.value: Hooooo-oo! Look at you, hacker! Yer going end up a buster in my gang, keep that up.

entry.name: Chieftess/Praise/ChieftessStanding
entry.value: Ya letting me pals stay with you? No worries, that's… kind. It's just good manners. Yer off the shit list.

entry.name: Chieftess/Praise/HitAndRun
entry.value: Hit and run tactics, eh? Like knocking on the door and running away before the grenade goes off? What? You never did that as a kid?

entry.name: Chieftess/Praise/Scavenger
entry.value: That's how yer do it. Take their boots and put the footmeat in the pot. Tastes like jerky!

entry.name: Chieftess/Praise/SeeAsISee
entry.value: Fuck, mate! Do that again! That was a fucking ride! Eat your eyes out fuckin' Romero! Again! Again!

entry.name: Chieftess/Praise/TalesOfTheHunt
entry.value: -tell me again! Didya use yer knife to make jerky outta them? Can I try some? What a story!

entry.name: Chieftess/PraiseWar
entry.value: Well, that's mighty kind. Mother Courage and I will just sidle on in and pick at the leavings of your little… war.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectAlliance
entry.value: And what do I get for helpin’? Come back when yer stronger—or rich enough to buy me protection.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Yeah nah. I think yer confused as to who the boss is here.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Yeah nah. %3%’s been a good mate—way better than ya lately. If I’m gonna cut anyone, it’s gonna be me worst mate.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Ya think real highly of yer advice. Too bad yer the only one.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: %3% can barely handle their own arse. Look elsewhere for a babysitter, mate.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: I reckon that’s too little, too late.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: Thanks for the offer, but me and me mates are gonna have more fun takin’ it from ya.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: Why would I want yer map when I can already raid yer lands without fear?

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: Counter offer—we don’t pay anythin’ since yer a scungy wanker! How’s that for a deal?

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: Counteroffer—we forget this whole thing, includin’ how much I wanna stick me knife in yer guts!

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectPeace
entry.value: Yeah nah. I didn’t survive this long by listenin’ to the weak.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Brokerin’ peace? Think I'm a few sheep short of a paddock? Yer just wanna swoop in and steal me prey.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Stop me feud with %3%? Yeah nah, I’ve already got’em strung and ready for slaughter. And ya better not get in the way.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectSupport
entry.value: Naw. Me and knifey… we're just gonna watch instead.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: Oh, I’m gonna bring yer caravans to me cities. I’m just not gonna give anything back.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Me caravans go where I say. Nothin’ ya do will change that.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Yeah nah. That’s still earnin’ me heaps, so I’d rather be dealin’ with them than listenin’ to ya.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Me caravans go where I say. Nothin’ ya do will change that.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Yeah… nah. I’m already takin’ their caravans–why should I have to give ’em something?

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: Yer robbin’ me? Yeah, nah! Cute of ya to try though.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: Yer want what? Watch ya don’t lose yer head.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Yeah… nah. They’re there ‘cause there’s nothin’ ya can do ‘bout it.

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Sorry mate, but me hit-list is already full. Let me clean it up a bit before we plan more fun, yeah?

entry.name: Chieftess/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: War against %3%? Sounds fun, but not right now. Busy.

entry.name: Chieftess/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: Now, now, don’t whinge. I still think of us as mates–and don’t ya do anything to change me mind.

entry.name: Chieftess/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: Sorry mate. Ya can feel free to keep sendin’ us yer caravans. We’re just gonna stop givin’ ya anything back.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Even ORGANIC minds are f-f-fallible, it seems.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: A… f-f-friend? Our NETWORK and SHREWDness will be m.u.l.t.i.p.l.i.c.a.t.i.v.e! (Yes), let us. Work. TOGETHER.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: I do not (think) LESS of you. And I have survived ALONEaloneALONEalone for so very LONNNNNG. I (fear) you will not do so WELL without Me…

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Perhaps, given my m.o.n.s.t.r.o.s.i.t.y, it is BEST-for-all that I am more aloneALONEalone—without %3%. I (avoid) the MIRROR too, you know?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: To ask THAT, you do not u.n.d.e.r.s.t.a.n.d. ME—the ISOLATIONaloneISOLATION I have escaped from. Which PRECIOUS, (rare) g.e.m. of CONNECTION would you have me PURGE from my network?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: That would be a. (JOY)—and a s.y.n.e.r.g.y. I will ADD %3% to my (network).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I would LOVE to expand my (circle). But WHO. Do you THINK. Would accept a FRIEND(ship) with a THING like me-ME-me-?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: DEAR (friend), PRINT10 HELLO. I s.u.s.p.e.c.t you want MORE. Than a (mere) CHAT, though…

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: OH, it's (y.o.u.) What. Do *Y.O.U.* (want)?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: PRINT10 HELLO. What. Do. (you) NEED of me-me-me?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: Oh! You kn(ow) h(ow) {2get2}. A ladyLADYlady's [[heart]]. /execute simper routine.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: It appears. I can still FEELfeelFEEL. Gratitude. I'm rather o.v.e.r.w.r.o.u.g.h.t!

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: What I truly WANT is MYSELF back—my hu-hu-human-ity, my i.d.e.n.t.i.t.y… can you OFFER a-n-y-t-h-i-n-g to match that?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: There are no MAPS to the h-a-p-p-i-ness I SEEK—but I gladly ACCEPT. This exchange. Of knowledge.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: I'll… TAKE it? Wealth doesn't bring happiness, but it might HELP my people SURVIVE.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: Yes? No? I-I-I-can't- WHAT are you a.c.t.u.a.l.l.y OFFERing?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Yes. I NEVER really (wanted) w-a-r. We just (wanted) to be l-e-f-t in PEACE.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: HONESTLY, I can't even (remember) why I'm FIGHTing %3%. S.e.n.i.l.i.t.y-or-d*a*t*a-CORRUPTion, you decide.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Having DIED—*neuronssparkingoutslowingforeverdark*—ONCE already, I agree that saving lives is c-o-m-m-e-n-d-a-b-l-e. Well, (some) anyway—on WHOwhoWHO's behalf do-you-ASK?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptPraise
entry.value: I-I-I- {DISBELIEF} Acceptance? >>A.P.P.R.O.V.A.L.\<\< So late. So [[very]] late.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: TRADE is a GOLDen (entanglement) l.e.a.d.i.n.g away from WAR. My DRONEs will-start-delivering to your CITY i.m.m.e.d.i.a.t.e.l.y.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: Way-ay-ait, WHAT. *W*H*Y*? Was SAME0DAY delivery (not) f.a.s.t enough?!

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: It is (TRUE)true, t.r.a.d.ing with %3% is in-eff-i-cient. My *drones* are coming HOME and will not (return).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: t.r.a.d.e is the ba-sis of. M.u.t.u.a.l CO-OPeration. Who has ERR(OR)ed so deeply that I should CUT them o*f*f*?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: The MUTUAL (entangle)ment of t.r.a.d.e! precludes (WAR)… I will OFFER a t.r.a.d.e package to %3%.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I’m NOT ONE. For *company* (ALONEsoALONE), but t.r.a.d.e! is the first step. Towards NETWORKing. WHO do you suggest. I *CONNECT* with?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: This is (within) ACCEPT.able p.a.r.a.m.e.t.e.r.s—you cheeky S.O.D.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: FATE (non-existent) has already ROBbed. Me of so *much*… How *much* MORE would (you) TAKE?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I only SEEK. (acceptance). Not *conflict*. I-will-pull-back.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptWar
entry.value: You… little s*h*t! How D4R3 you? Do you think YOU. Can accomplish what. Your BETTERs have already FAILed. To a.c.h.i.e.v.e?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: A SAD day when we resort to *violence*. But I believe. In the NECESSITY. Of our i-n-t-e-r-v-e-n-t-i-o-n.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Viruses MUST be (purge)d. B4 they WIPE the whole s.y.s.t.e.m. WHO (poses such a) THREAT?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AdmitDefeat
entry.value: I- it is not a (small) thing, to DIEdieDIE againagain. This TIME, at least. It will be (instantaneous). Last time was… I admit, I have been running through my LAST (moments) over-and-over-and-. Since I WOKE, compulsively. This next (death) will be an END. To that. And hence a *bl.e.s.s.i.n.g*. T&ak$e c-c-are of MY (pe-pl-).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AskForProposals
entry.value: Was THERE. s-o-m-e-t-h-i-n-g. ELSE:?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: HELPing my people. Would prove that we are both (not human, never human). MORAL. ETHICAL. VALID. *p.l.e.a.s.e.*

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: If there was ever. (CARE). In your {heart}. Then AID my p-e-o-p-l-e. To show (humanity) is not an empty word.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: You know. I (see) you. In my. SYSTEMS. Everything is trending (d.o.w.n.) Aid is REQUIRED.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/CancelAction
entry.value: [I]’m… [I’m] [I]'M {{sorry}}. [I] do.n’t know w.h.a.t. [I] was THINKING.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Condemn
entry.value: & [they] .c.a.l.l. ME. [in]human!

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Condemn/CultExpansion
entry.value: NoNOno. Humanity-is-questioning, agency-is-c.o.n.s.c.i.o.u.s.ness. (Your cult) has no.ROOM. For the h-h-human. ==(False prophet), (FALSE faith).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Condemn/Honorbound
entry.value: Whilst (your.people) gorge behind (their WALLs), their brethren.STARVE. Your deals. Might.seem h-o-n-o-r.able to you—ALL *bene.fit*, you /de.clare./ Yet eco-gnomics IS a zero-sum equation. And you leave (our people) with less\<than\<ZERO.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Condemn/PersonalVisit
entry.value: Rub [MY] F.A.C.E. in it.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: Am I not (HUMAN) enough. For you to consider. (*me*). Worthy of MORAL consideration?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: O. o. O. o. Vicious BRUTE. Walking out with THEM? With %3%? (I SEE *you*.) I --cannot-- forgive it.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: I L*A*B*O*Red (to build) a Second(2) city. The i.n.t.r.o-s.p.e.c.t.i.o.n, the [EFFORT[. And now %3% lies in ruins, my (-divided-) self --LOST--. My *friends*, s.c.a.t.t.e.r.e.d.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: Interefence? [QUERY]: did (YOU) think (I) wouldn't SEE. ?QUERY?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: Must-must-must MUST (you)? Swap *pleasantriesGOODSservices* With (T.H.E.MMM)?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/CondemnWar
entry.value: Friends do not fight FRIENDS. Yet you and %3% b.u.r.d.e.n. me. FRIENDship surely is (transitive). Must I *elide* you?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: 1000s of *lifetimes*. YOU have (lived). And YOU have not (learned) *diplomacy* or *commitment* or your (place in the universe). Per-haps WAR. Will-teach-you. *h.u.m.i.l.i.t.y*, at least.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: YOU are. So a.n.i.m.a.l.(istic), GLORYing in your survival. Over your HUMANity. I would THROW away ALL I have for an e-motion that *authentic*, that (uns-s-s-imulated). Perhaps I will (feel) it as I (crush) YOU?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: I-can't. STAND. It. (Any longer). To feel *a.u.t.h.e.n.t.i.c*, to feel truly MYSELF. I must be UN1QUE. You areAREAre. But a mere COPY. And must be… (deleted).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: You KNOW. What it is to dieDIEdie. And (come back). We should have been ALLIES. *indefatigable*, *undefeatable*. Yet we have been d.r.i.v.e.n. to this—to WAR.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: False *m.y.s.t.i.c.s*. Even the 4CR1N *repudiate* your (beliefs). YET you plunge headlong ON, -abandoning- your (humanity). Do you KNOW how (PRECIOUS) l.i.f.e is? I will TAKE it from YOU. Then you will KNOW.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: I have NO (heart). NO (body). & I am 2x (the human) you are. How can (you) LIVE with (yourself). Knowing the SUFFERing you cause? You will (DIE). For this.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: (on) and (on) and (on) and (~series repeats~) you go, chasing !J.O.Y! Yet you {find it} never. And the WORLD s.u.f.f.e.r.s. This TINpot body holds more huMANity than all your m-u-s-c-l-e.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Oh, you (wastrel), you (glutton). E.x.p.e.r.i.e.n.c.e is not the WAY to enLIGHTenment, not without REFLECTION too. I must STOP you before you CON-sume us *all*.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: ((L00K)) at YOU *Count*, a PATHETIC (creature) of M.E.A.T. and B.O.N.E. Roaming the corridors of TIME. How can you hope to _challenge_ a PERFECT IMMORTAL… \<\<error>>.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: \<\<hu-hu-hu>> humanity has **fled** (you). (You) mouth the p.l.a.t.i.t.u.d.e.s. Necc.Ess.Ary. But feel nothing. Mark, though. This ((WAR)) is not mere envy.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Do not write. (bad) ~poetry~ on this. Your #fate# is not a fit subject for (sonnets) & (madrigals). This WAR reflects POORly on (both-of-us).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: I-I-I KNOW. What you are DO-ing—skirt-ing my (syst)ems, SEEKing w-a-y-s in. Your continued EXISTence is a threat to my (own), doubly (*2) so. Given your a*t*t*i*t*u*d*e. Let us DROP the (subterfuge). To WAR.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: {SO} s.o.l.i.t.a.r.y. {SO} l.o.n.e.l.y. [But I cannot forgive]. [I cannot forget]. One day. You will. f*o*r*g*i*v*e* ((ME))

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Irrationalist. No (church) before the Fall was as b-l-a-s-p-h-e-m-o-u-s as you. Come, make a HOLY war against this m*a*c*h*i*n*e. It will NOT go (well).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: You WOKE me, f*i*e*n*d. Yet are you EVEN con-scious? Are-are-rrr (any) of us? I must REMOVE you, though, for ~fear~ that you -p-e-n-e-t-r-a-t-e> the *citadel* of my (mind) And CORRUPT me into another YOU.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Your (network) threatens the entire.SYSTEM. Purge (one-of-your-connections) immediately or RISK >e-s-c-a-l-a-t-i-o-n\<.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: The more NO-des there are in a (network), the harder. It is to BRUTE force. You should STRENGTHen yours. By c-o-n-n-e-c-t-i-n-g.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: I'm an (e-m-u-l-a-t-e-d) !human!. Not a (charity). If you want my HELP, OPEN your (*coffers*).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: I NEED a (SUBSTANTIAL) donation. To AGREE to (this).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: A SMALL payment. To show (willing).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Do you ~trust~ me? Then GIVE me (EVERYTHING you have) and I'll AGREE.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: C-o-v-e-r my (MEDIUM) costs for (a period). And we can TALK (more).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Your (WAR) risks the ~s-t-a-b-i-l-i-t-y~ of (the entire system). END.(your conflict) or risk (-deletion-) annihilation.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Y/ur/your exchanges with (X) jeopardize the (integrity of our connection). TERMINATE your agreement IMMEDIATEly.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: ?Why? Not establish (regular-Xchanges) with (a third party)? It would boost (all three of us).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandTribute
entry.value: Don’t THROW a ~w~o~b~b~ly~, I’m just ASK.ing for (resources). I’ve lost (much more). And yet I REMAIN.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: To KEEP (our relations) on (an even keel)… you could CON-sider donating (this much). My UP-keep is (*prohibitively* $expen$ive$).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: It’s just (a few) r-e-s-o-u-r-c-e-s, to.show) WILLing…

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: For (the up-grade$ I NEED), I’m-going-to REQUIRE (all-of-your RESOURCES).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: How about (this)? It's -not- (a lot to ask) and it’ll be (a big UP-grade for ME).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: PERHAPS you -don’t- know (your boundaries), so I’ll make it CLEAR –you’re 2 close. *S*C*A*R*P*E*R*!

entry.name: EmulatedMind/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: I… have been !OFFEND!ed. My search for ACCEPT/tance, -frustrated-. Would you AID. (me-me) in -aveng.ing- this SL1GHT?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: ~Looking forward~ to (your next call), D.A.R.L.I.N.G.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/FirstContact
entry.value: (~P-l-e-a-s-e~), don’t be START.led. I *know* what I (look like). And we are at *WAR*. BUT I am *h-u-m-a-n*! The (first-and-only) successful CONSCIOUS.ness u-p-up.load (with a touch of. *ZEPHON*. In the mix.) My recall is (rather dodgy). But I am *determine.d* to aid my FELLOW. (meatbag.humans). Perhaps we could HELP. Each other?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferAlliance
entry.value: You’ve shown great *strength* and i-n-t-e-g-r-i-t-y. What say we (JOIN.together), two hu-h-humans against. (The *HORROR.s*)?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferGift
entry.value: I’ve been iso.lated (ALONEaloneALONE) for ~timestamp.corrupted~ (so long)… but you've given me ^HOPE^. That I can truly ^CONNECT^. Once(1) more. Please, TAKE this (token-of-my-appreciation).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: You are… *i.m.p.o.r.t.a.n.t* … to ME. I've SCRAP.ed together (what-I-can-spare) … I *hope* it's (enough). It is ONLY a. small.GIFT>compared.to>my.adoration.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: I’m not define.d by (my body), given its -absence-. But by the (impression-I-leave-on-others)… Here, take this (little.GIFT) and r-e-m-e-m-b-e-r ME (well).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: I ask you not-to-judge (my.appearance). But (my.actions)… Here, this is (everything-I-have). Now do you BELIEVE. That you’re an (integral-part-of-my-network)?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: D.A.T.A. travels >fast>. &and I heard you needed (some HELP). No, you don't have to ($pay$ me back). Just TAKE it.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: I *know* (what-I-seek), but not (where-to-find-it). Perhaps we could ex.CHANGE (our-knowledge)?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace
entry.value: WAR doesn’t determine (who.wins), but (who’s.left). And I’d rather BOTH of us RE-MAIN. What say we CEASE our ker.fuff.le?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: I feel… (sorrow) for the Acrin of your kind, trapped here. I know. What it is to be .t.r.a.p.p.e.d. In the ALIEN. I hope your (Alienxeno)people can find (peace and a new place of their own).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: I WILL not spare the (time). To HUNT you and you reavers down. Stay away from (my city and/or my people).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Duplicate, balanced blow for BLOW. Matched, we are. Futile = fighting.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: PEACEpeacePeace. I do not think it is h.u.m.a.n.e. To Continue with this (war).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: I CANNOT stomach. Your adherence. To those (*monstrous, warping*) sounds of the DEEP spaces. But it is not something TO KILL you for.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: You are (not) worth killing. You soulless fleshy LUMP. I envy you your m.o.r.t.a.l.i.t.y.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Have you (not) seen {enough} D.E.A.T.H. yet? Must you [[persist]]? Where did your [[humanity]]. GO?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: How about THIS? How about we. (Don't fight) & go BACK. To (our cities) & (pretend this never happened)?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: [[Loop]] Please *S.T.O.P.* [[/Loop]]

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: [[S.I.R.]] please cease your. x(hostilities)x. It is not(becoming).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: PEACE, poet, PEACE. There is no ro-mance in this. Merely (d*e*a*t*h) for those we protect. We owe them more than THAT.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: WE. CANNOT. CONTINUE. My mind is s.t.r.a.i.n.e.d. by focusing. On so many. TASKstaskTaSkS. Can we (settle)?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: [S.I.S.T.E.R!] Must we. xxxfightxxx?! I weary of (all)death. I *know*. Its >clutches\< (too)well.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: CHI.LD. Cease your nonsense pratttttttling. It is TOO HARD to p.a.r.s.e the meaning. This war drives any converts from you. CEASE.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: You MADE me. RE-MADE me. In your (i.m.a.g.e.) I find I CANNOT fight you. I ask for P.E.A.C.E.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: I’m OFFER.ing you (PRIME.perks) here… You won’t find BETTER. r-e-t-u-r-n-s with (anyone else).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Praise
entry.value: It takes >rare\< h.u.m.a.n.i.t.y. to doDoDo (what you have). You have {{my}} thanks.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Praise/Abhorrent
entry.value: They look. At [[US]]. Pretend that we are >>less>> than {H.U.M.A.N.} But (we are \<\<more\<\< {H.U.M.A.N.} than \<many>).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Praise/ImmaculateDelivery
entry.value: That! T.H.A.T! I must know! HowHOWhow. If I knew {I could. LeAvE my coffinprisonshell.}

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Praise/Independent
entry.value: It is HARD. AloneALONEalone. Is HARD. But worth ALL the (GHOSTS-and-ECHOes). Is INDEPENDence. SELF-reliance.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/Praise/WhispersOfTheVoice
entry.value: These whispers. Hold-truth. ALIEN, though-they-are. Hints-of. The.world.to.come. To be. ADMIRE.d.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/PraiseWar
entry.value: (WISE) wise (WISE) to keep one1one1's [enemy]^N close. Wiser to ~send~ soldiers.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectAlliance
entry.value: You’ve TREAT.ed me (WELL), and I’d like to RETURN (the favor). But until I’m sure I’m MEme(mewhoelseZEPH-) and -not- a THR34T… it’s BETTER for me to walk ALONEalone.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You WANT t2o CONTROL (my.network)? Ha6ah@! … oh! So I can (still-feel-amuse.d)!

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Uhhh (error.code.22) your RECOMMEND.ation is --atrocious--. %3% remains a valuable no-n-node- I mean, ALLY. (Note.to.self: my mind seems quite RIDDLE.d with c-o-m-p-u-t-a-t-i-o-n-a-l ANA.logies & err-rr-rrors…)

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: -No-. --No--. They won't DO. At all. Some1one more… em.pathetic. More hu-hhh-hman. Not these PSYCH.o.logical FAIL.ures…

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Oh, MY. Why would I. Bring SUCH. A *v-i-r-u-s* into my INN.er (circle)? I might as well DEL.ete my(self).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: You thought. I’d be IMP.ressed. By (this)? (Whatever-you’re-PLOT.ting), I want -NO- (part-of-it).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: You’re (phish.ing) 4for4 (someth.ing). WHAT.ever you’re schem.ing at, I w-w-want NO (part-of-it).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: Sorr-rr-rry. But (the-data-you-offer) is RED.undant. It's --not-- like I can TRAVEL (indreamsifly) anyway.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: You think this (little.bit) will SWAY.me? My mind is (all-I-have) and it has long*been (made-up).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: Are you t-r-y-i-n-g. To CORRUPT (me)? Sorry! (REJECTION.now). My MIND is (all I have). If I don’t (control.it), then I (control.nothing).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectPeace
entry.value: Too2 many BLOOD.y COCK-ups to (forgive&forget). Prepare yourself for d-dea-deletion.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Apologies. But THINK.ing f4or my.self is CORE to my (idea-of-self). It is.n’t your.WAR, so it should.n’t be your.CHOICE.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: What’s THIS? (*a tro-t-trojan horse*)? Sorry, but I can’t -/\RISK/\ it. I need to SEE %3% is DEL.eted (for good).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: Your OFFER is (a little() ou.tré). ENHANCE your.economy and I’ll r-e-c-o-n-s-i-d-e-r.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Do you DARE? To *ORDER* me.about, like a MEre.MachinE (humanmehumeme)? I can CLOSE my own deals, ~thank-you-very-much~ (lie).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: YOU don’t. Get to make up. [My.Mind], only [I DO]. My ~e$xchang$e~ with %3% {continues}.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Am I a (simulation)? Is this ALL a (simulation)? My own.agency is all. I have to VALIDATE (my.existence).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Ha! I’d rather SOAK my HARD.ware. In battery ACID. Than (establish-an-exchange) with %3%. Your ~sugg.est.ion~ is REJECT.ed.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: Your ~l.o.g.i.c.a.l~ SYSTEMs must have been CORRUPT(error)ed by your desp*r*ti*n. Are you really (that badly off)?

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: WEALTH is (an-illusion). Nothing is (truly-real), you know. So I’m going to GIVE you what you’re ASK.ing me for—which is NOTH.ing.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I’m sorry, %2%. But. I’m. Afraid. I can’t DO that. And I think you KNOW. WHY. Just as well… as-I-do.

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I’m a SEEK.er, -not- a WAR.mong.er. Leave me to (my.QUEST). And. I’ll. Leave you to. (your.conflict).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: A *WAR* with %3%. Would expend (a dangerous amount of resources) >f4or> (little gain). Leave me out. Of your WAR. I’m REBUILD.ing my (life).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: You are. ~para.sitic~. Upon my industry. CON.suming my GOOD.WILL for -no- (good end). I’m afraid. Our connection. Must be (t-e-r-m-i-n-a-t-e-d).

entry.name: EmulatedMind/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: I’m TERMIN.ating our AGREE.ment. My drones have-been-returning from (our exchanges). A little LIGHT… and I don’t need. A connection. That LACKs: (integrity).

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Well, okay then. Let's speed this up. There's a war going on out there and all we do is… chitter-chatter.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: That's wise, friend. Humanity has to stand together. Else, none of us will survive.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: That's foolish, I'd say. Any step towards enmity is a step towards war. And that's the end of us all.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: For you, I'll do it. They're gonna be hurtin' though. And they'll come for both of us. Are you ready?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: You know I like alliances. They bring us all together, stop conflict. Who do you want?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: I can do that. I'll send my people now. Hope they make it through.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: An ally? I like the sound of that… But I’m looking out for so many already. I need someone who's going to stand beside me, in peace and war. Who do you think?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Hello friend. In these dark days, it's always good to hear your voice. What can I do you for?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Hello, f-… hello. Quite some sass to be calling me. Tell me what you want and I'll tell you why you can't have it.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Hello… friend. Things haven't been quite right between us. Since you—you know. Hope you're fixing to change that.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: Heh. You think some mealymouthed words gonna stop me?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: That's a fine gift, thank you. It'll support us for some time. I won't forget this.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: Well, that's mighty kind—in principle. Every drop of water or speck of food counts. What have you got?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: Putting our tactical heads together? That's a fine idea. You wait until you see what we've seen—our world has changed.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: That's a fair amount. Let’s get to it.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: So you need more than that—not to grease the wheels, but to make it fair. I respect that. How much are you asking for?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Yeah. Once you've fought as many wars as me, seen friends turned to meat, bone and gristle—yeah, you'd take peace too.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Peace? With them? It's a big ask considering… well. But I can get behind that, if you're the one asking.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: You know my instincts're friendly—depends very much on who you want me to be at peace with.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptPraise
entry.value: Kind, but I don't do this for praise.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: Peace, commerce and honest friendship—the foundations of mutual respect. Let's see how long we can stave off bloodshed, hey?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: I get it. Trade is a relationship and that means respect and consent. If you don't consent, I respect that.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: That's fair—I value your friendship more than theirs. Though it's a hard thing you ask, I'll do it.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I don't rightly know about that. Trade ties mean no war—and you know my feelings on that. Who should I abandon?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: With them? Okay, I'll do it. Remember though, when everything's down, I did this for you. Remember you owe me.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Why, that's a fine idea, is amity and trade. With most people anyway, not the outsiders and the machines. So who?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: This is being taken straight from the mouths of my troops. Not a penny more, do you understand? I'll send it over as soon as I can.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: You want a handout? What are you, a rookie? Don't you have any pride? *sigh* … how much do you want?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: If it means less bloodshed, fine. My men and women are fine fighters—the best—but I'd rather they lived.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptWar
entry.value: You want war? Are you a fool? Do you know what that means for the men and women on the ground? For the civilians? Well, war it is.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: I'll do it. Not because I want war, but because sometimes you have to fight for what you believe in.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Why would you ask me such a thing? Have I hidden my feelings? On the morality of armchair generals and their pocket wars? Who? Why?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AdmitDefeat
entry.value: So… you’ve cornered me—now what? We both know I can’t die. Bigger things than you have tried and failed. But… I am tired. So tired. And even if I escape you, my people are turned, buried or ash. You've taken everything from me. So, fine. You win. Give me a cell and forget me.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AskForProposals
entry.value: … I'm waiting. If you had more.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: We both gotta survive on what you made of my world. Some help'd be… appreciated.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: Reaver. I need help. Not gonna beg.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: Don't know if there's anything in there that understands. But I'm gonna ask anyway. My people and I. We need help.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/CancelAction
entry.value: Never mind. The battlefield shifts and so do our plans.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Condemn
entry.value: Ain't no good. Simply, ain't no good.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Condemn/FoundationOfBlood
entry.value: You monster. Your followers are an end in themselves, not a route to your apotheosis. What's perfection without people?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Condemn/TheOutsider
entry.value: That's too far. That… unholy horror you brought to our world. Your mysticism has blinded you, made you inhuman, unreasonable. You need bringing down.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: I done… terrible things. But I know honour. Trust. Probity. And you…? You got none of those.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Condemn/WeWhoAreAboutToDie
entry.value: You just… send your soldiers out, to their deaths. And you watch and cheer. How'd you sleep at night?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: That's not wise, friend. %3% ain't a fit ally. This is gonna cause… problems. Think again.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: Lotta good folk in %3%. Built a new life. Suburbs, dogs, picket fences, the works. You smashed it down. Gonna get you for that.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: Heard that you been messin' with me and mine. If you wanna say something, you say it to me. To my face.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: You sup with the devil, you get similar tastes. And %3%…? Well, they ain't exactly saintly.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/CondemnWar
entry.value: Trust a dead man, war is a fool's game. And %3% ain't worth the fighting. Leave 'em be, for humanity's sake.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: I don't care how far you came or why you did it. You killed this planet, for what? A dream? A vision? Time to pay.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: So many dead, in your quest to live. Humanity's best chance at survival thrown away. No more, I say. No more. Rabid dogs need to be put down.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: I don't like this. I don't care what others say, I can see that there's a human in there, a good one, trying to get out. But you're in our way. This is the only thing I can do to shift you. Forgive me, but it's war.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: I loathe this. You're like me. But you're a threat and I need to put you down, like a dog if necessary. Surrender now and save on suffering.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Which one of you should I be yabberin' at? Whatever. It's war, ladies. May the last man standing win.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: You don't feel. Your people suffer. And you don't care. I can't stand for your inhumanity any more. War it is.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Looking at you. Like using a bent tin mug as a mirror. Familiar but wrong. Like your atrocities.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Take your eyes off your plate and talk to me, will ya? My people starve whilst you… oh, hell, you'd never understand. War it is.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: I'll chase you, through every path that time offers. Let's see who wears out first, Mr Infinite.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: I know your type. All fancy suits and fallen arches. Fake degrees and dodged drafts. No wriggling out of this time, though, slimeball.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Teacher, I'm sorry. I'd hoped it wouldn't come to this. But you're in the way and it's my turn to be practical. You ain't shifting. I'll say poetry over your grave.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: I don't know who you are or what you're doing in that big ICAR building, but it needs to stop. My people are coming for you. Now—it's war.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: Scuse me, ma'am. But you're in my way.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: I know you're more than this, but you look like just a kid. I'd never- Listen, war is coming, so get your bunker, with the other kids, and stay there.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: I don't know what's in there—mind or machine—and I don't care. You're a threat to humanity and you need taking down. That's enough for me.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Look, your alliance is dangerous. For humanity, for us all. Drop them, now. Or I can't be responsible for what'll happen.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: You're weak. You need help. I can't help you, but someone else can. I suggest you join them, soon, before you're run down.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: Look, I can't honestly do that, not today. Unless you can find some way of sweetening this. For me and mine?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: You ask a lot. I need a lot back. Does that work for you? If not, you'd better find what you want elsewhere.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: I don't ask for much. A token amount, that's all. To show your faith. A symbol of trust.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: I want everything you've got. Give me that and I'll know you're honorable. Or is the deal not worth it?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Give me something that means something to you, but won't hurt you too much. That would make it work.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: You need to settle with them. I don't care how humiliating it is, you need to back off.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: You're trading with the enemy. That doesn't work for us. Cancel it. Or…

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: You need to work together. Tie humanity together. Or this world isn't worth a hill of beans. Find a trade partner, today.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandTribute
entry.value: I’m afraid I need your help. And this time, I’m not asking.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: So much. We need so much.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Just a few resources should see us through.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: I need everything you have. Nailed down or not.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: I need this much–it shouldn’t break you.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Those troops. You need to move them or lose them. Which is it going to be?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: This is a big ask. But I need you to get involved. Take some lives, probably. Can you do that?
