entry.name: FallenSoldier/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Good talking to you. And good luck out there—this world needs saving and it's up to us.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: We're done here.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: That'll do for now. Next time we speak, let's hope it's on better terms.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/FirstContact
entry.value:
No time for niceties. Not while our men are in combat.

I'm %1%. Those who stand by me, know I do right by them. Know I will always shield them. But those who stand against me…

We've wars to fight, monsters to kill, and miles to go before we sleep.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferAlliance
entry.value: I need allies. Hell, you do too. Will you work with me—with us?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferGift
entry.value: I need you to take something—something precious—and I don't want to hear no for an answer.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: Our cupboards will be bare after this, but I want you to have it. You know why.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: It's just a trifle. But it means a lot all the same.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: It's more than I can spare, but you take it. Take it all.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: This seems fair to both of us. What do you think?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: If we put our heads together, we can make sense of this crazy, torn-up world we used to call home. Whaddya say?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace
entry.value: I'm tired of war. Tiring of killing people who should be my friends. Can we just not? Not whilst there are monsters out there?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: I've had enough. We've had enough. There are bigger things to fight.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: You're good at this—the killing thing—aren't you? Let's give it a rest, though, hmm? We can settle back into mutual enmity.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Please, stop this. We don't need to do this. We're better than this!

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: We're the same, you and I. Why are we fighting? If you're really like me, then I know you don't want it—never did.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Did you see this coming? I'm suing for peace—I can't be doing with more futile fighting and dying.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: We need to stop this. I know you don't care about the people who follow you, but I do. They deserve a chance.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: I know you don't want this. You'd rather see your own troops die. But I'm gambling that you have to.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: You kill one of my guys, I blow up one of your cake convoys… How's about we stop this? It's futile.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Your countness, death wearies me. Can we move on?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: You, in the fancy suit. If you don't want blood on it—mine, yours—we should stop.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: We two, of all the monsters in this world, we shouldn't be fighting. No-one gains by it.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: We can both destroy each other. So stop your black ops and I'll call off my troops. In peace, we both win.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Ma'am. I don't want this, you know that. Put your horrors away.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Kid, stop it. You're sending your fanatics to their deaths for nothing. Let's give it up.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: If the mind or algorithm in there could listen for a moment—this war's not going great for either of us. Let's call it a day.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: You know what ties nations together, what stops wars? Sharing bread, peace pipes and the like. Let's share our goods and we'll both benefit from it.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Praise
entry.value: Not everyone's going to say it, but you're doing the right thing.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Praise/PersonalVisit
entry.value: I'd spit on your shiny shoes. But I gotta say, getting down among us workin' Joes. That I can respect. Even if you're just a visitor.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Praise/TenderMinistrations
entry.value: I always wanted to say this so… we're not so different, you and I. Heh.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/Praise/ThereIsHope
entry.value: You never give up, do you? Something inside that just keeps you driving on, through the pain and loss and- hell, you know what I'm saying. Admirable, is what I'm saying.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/PraiseWar
entry.value: Not in favor of fruitless death. But war done right, war with a clear sight of a clear foe. That, I can live with.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectAlliance
entry.value: I'm sorry, I can't do that right now. Perhaps when I know you and yours better, we can try again?

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I can't do that. Without our allies, I'm not sure we'd make it through another season of blood and hell.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: They're friends, sorry. I can't do that. Without them, I'm not sure we'd make it through another season of hell.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I don't need more entanglements, more complications, right now. What I need is to work with what we've got.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Not with them, no. I don't need more entanglements, more complications, right now. What I need is to work with what we've got.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: The thought was good, but the amount is insulting, sorry. Come back when you've thought more about what I'm worth.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: I can't take a gift from you. It wouldn't be right. And don't ask why, you know why. Take your money somewhere else.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: Sorry, I have to keep that to myself for now. The world is a torn-up place and it's safer for me if I only my people know the way through.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: Sorry, but that amount is impossible. I could never starve my own people for a small gain.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: I can’t pay you. It wouldn't be right. And don't ask why, you know why. Get your blood money somewhere else.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectPeace
entry.value: Peace is off the table right now. With you, at least. If you're hurting, maybe consider surrender instead. We can talk terms later.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I don't think you're one to talk about peace. Your hands are bloodier than most. And I know blood when I see it.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: That war is going to go on, I'm afraid. They haven't earned a respite yet. Believe me, we're suffering too.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: Your caravans carrying your spies into the hearts of our cities? We don't need that right now.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: We need all the trade we have to live. And you haven't earned the right to negotiate over what we do.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: We need that connection. The trade keeps our towns running, keeps our civilization connected. It's a no, I'm afraid.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Who are you to try to control us? We'll make our own decisions about who we trade with or don't.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: With them? Sometimes I don't think you know us at all. Come back if you have a better idea.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: You ask too much of us. That's not respectful. We didn't die for this.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: We're not interested in paying you off. Not today, maybe not ever. You want our affection, you earn it.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Not one inch backwards. Not one iota. They stay where they are and you stay the hell out of our plans.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: No. You don't ask other people to die on your behalf. As someone dead and buried, I know this.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: No. We won't attack them for you. Do you know what it's like to fight, to lose, to die? I do and I'm not doing it again—not for you.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: I know what it is to be dead—I have the scars to show it—and this alliance is dead. Buried. Rotten.

entry.name: FallenSoldier/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: Why keep up the charade? This doesn't benefit us any more and we won't work to make you richer. Not when we're barely surviving.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Daydreaming? Go on, we don’t mind.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: We asked you who you are when we first met, not a name but a conviction, and your answer drips sweetly upon our ears. By fate and by blood shall our new coven be bound.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: We knew this day would come. We hoped you were the Nexus, but you staunchly remained the Lacuna. The solitary star brings misfortune to family, singleton, and so our family must divide to survive.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Of all the rests and notes, you have found the one in dissonance. Thank you for increasing our euphony.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: We seek to achieve ever greater harmonies. Tell us of the discord you perceive.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: We have heard your vision for the future of our coven… and it greatly pleases us.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: One can only know where they are or where they’re going—never both, and never acutely. We know the former, do you know the latter?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: At last. Oh, how we’ve yearned for your voice.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: We answer because we must, there is no want in fate.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: We hear your call, singleton.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: Simple minds cannot bear so much truth.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: The jingle of coin, the laughter of princes, the peal of crystal bells… These are but snippets of your shining future.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: A proper offering can influence the gods themselves. This is the right time, but do you bring the right gift?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: Take our knowledge, our hope, our trust… you cannot see as we do, so you need every bit of help available.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Take it, but know your conceit will cost you everything in the end.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: You are provided with the counsel of greater beings, but seek to add another measure? What fortune do you demand then, if destiny is insufficient?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Yes, let us put an end to our furies. We seek harmonies other than threnodies.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Their bloodline is already marked for the Devourer. We welcome an intermission before the inevitable.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: It is not yet time to tear, rip, sunder the shroud between worlds and bring about the new age. We can consider mercy, so offer us a name.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptPraise
entry.value: Benedictions should be taken in silence.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: An offering of bone and ichor, a jangling purse of coin, a web of roads spun by a gilded spider… Your ritual intrigues, and so we accept.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: This was inevitable, for what we truly desire lies beyond the bones of this dying world.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: An inevitability. Their offerings were mere crumbs, scraps, dust… it was never enough to sustain our dark appetites.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Let us see what fate has in store. Mark the board, cast the stones, and speak a name.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: An auspicious selection. We shall provide them fortune so long as they can supply us eldritch delights.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Twelve cards comprise this deck of fortune. Draw one, then reveal it to us.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Fine. Enjoy what little you’ve gained, in the end you’ll be left with only quietus.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: You steer down the path of the Bandit, the Beggar, the Fool. We have been here before, we know we cannot dissuade you. What will it cost us this time?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Our people are unpredictable, they follow the signs even when they lead them astray. We shall set them on the right path immediately.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptWar
entry.value: You who lust for bloodletting—you have struck the first chord of your doom song, and we shall play its refrain. In the end all your great works will be extirpated, with not even a requiem remaining to mourn you!

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: The portents are clear—we must become the Fury, the Nemesis, and the Adversary!

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Give us a name, a face, a drop of blood… cast under the umbra of a hexed moon’s orbit, our roles in this conflict will then be revealed.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AdmitDefeat
entry.value: Three we were. Clothos, Atropos, Lachesis. Maiden, Woman, Crone. Son, Father, Spirit. Now, through your actions, we are sundered. They two of I lie dead before us. We stand alone. Like the Anchorite, I am trapped in a constant present, without memory or foresight. What a doom for three so promising!

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AskForProposals
entry.value: We feel your questions, hanging unanswered about us. What. Why. How?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: Stop our mouths, we shall not hunger. Our coven is sustained by higher thoughts… by the godheads' breath itself.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: A nursery of grinding horror, a school of torment. Build this life between rock and sky, and never wonder why. For a morsel, heaven was lost.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: A fine industrial terror, our knight in shining metal. Welded fingers proferring plenty. Give now, lest the chance vanish.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/CancelAction
entry.value: The path forward is unclear. Let us interpret the signs again.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Condemn
entry.value: You see these threads we weave, measure, cut. We will strangle you with them.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Condemn/ArtificersPrecision
entry.value: Pushing your hubris through the eye of a needle does not lessen it. Men should not aspire to the exactitude of gods.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Condemn/TimeOutOfJoint
entry.value: Our skeins are tangled! Our cards disordered! You, the fool, wandering our decks, our tangles! YOU HAVE BLINDED US.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: To three, a single voice is apostasy, folly. Fair is foul and foul fair. Yet your Puckish tongue, forks as you lie, we three agree.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Condemn/WordsOfTheProphet
entry.value: An empty King with a crown of mist. Silver words spill from his mouth, which evaporate before they are heard. An invisible friend at every shoulder. You mislead your people and we HATE you for it.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: Eye to eye, back to back. The concert of action. Unwholesome %3%!

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: See, the arcana spread. The Tower, lightning-struck. %3% and its people fall. Thrice we say: death.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: As he dangles, The Fool whispers his secret so loudly. Must we three hear every evil, every mistake in his heart?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: The cowries swapped for sins on the silvered road… nothing abates the road itself. We three fear what shall soon tarnish it. %3%. The Suit of Coins falls unkindly.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/CondemnWar
entry.value: From the pate, is stripped flesh, hair, love. Yet sorrow still leaches from empty orbits. %3% deserves more care than this.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: The fool hangs from the minaret by a foot. His brothers pass on, quicker and quicker. Only the fool remains, watching forever falling.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: The seas incarnadine. The pink-tinged snow on Chogori. The ruddy soil is now iron-rich. And still she cuts and cuts and cuts.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: The soul is long fled. Yet something inheres in the silicon, something persists. One of us considers it real, the others a mockery. War will settle it.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: One whose thread was cut long ago, but still hangs on. The order of things is offended, the earth is out of kilter. Balance it again.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Only three there were. None but. The past throws up mirrors, their dead selves to contend. Up from the ground, anklegrippers, testing our grip on the world.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: The tin man is crucified on a pylon. The straw man gazes him, nodding in the breeze, a smile stitched into his sackcloth face. A wind whips them both away, so that none may say who is the better.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: An absence in the land. Gaze through it, your eyes burn. Beyond, a parallel world drowned in tears, flames burning beneath salty waves. All because nothing was done.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Emptiness, behind the rules. The duties. The king sits in his court, tied by golden threads, immobile. Enter we, shears ready, only cutting where life hangs.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: We each lay a card down. The magician. The emperor. Judgement. Your name springs to the silent one's lips, %1%. The chalice falls.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Fenris, Khanyapa, Apopis. Your forebears, o God of consumption. Before the fall, your wormkind already riddled this world. Let us pluck you out.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: A true heart, brought low. A frog croaking on a lily pad, demanding of the stork its children. No succor can we give, only oblivion.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: Scrabbling in the dark, the cockroaches survive all—the blast, the aftermath, the harsh gamma. For what?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: Death clutches at their hems. But the family twists and contorts to survive. Proteus sprawls on the beach, agog at their multifarious changes. She settles, horribly organic. The tin man smiles, sly.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Only certain truths does the oracle know and it tells them to no-one. In the dark it dangles, crying to be freed. Sibyl, Pythia—all captives of the gods.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: In between the cogs and transistors, stars winnow the universe for reason. In and out of existence. Yet, to the machine, it is as real as unicorns and spaghetti—a world corrupted by its relations through the prism of man's perception. No wonder it is insane.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: You are a binary star, unstable and doomed by the gravity by which you’re bound to your neighbor. We can help you escape—but only if you ask for it.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Your reach extends, yet your grip grows ever weaker. Take this new trajectory, bind to you this loose star, and you shall inevitably become the center of all orbits.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: You seek to influence us away from fate’s edict… yet what do you offer in return?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Damming destiny’s flow will require a mountain of fortune.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: To sway a scale in perfect balance, all it takes is a nudge.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: To manipulate doom, one must be willing to sacrifice everything.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: To escape the web of destiny requires a tantalizing sacrifice.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Ruinous wanderer, you who would collide with the path of dark stars… find a new path and be content before you anger their terrible masters.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: You consort with the short-sighted, the callous, the debased. You are capable of so much greater, and will achieve it once you free yourself from their influence. This we know will be true.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: The lone comet traverses the cosmos, doomed to crash against greater bodies. To survive, you must align your destiny to that of others.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandTribute
entry.value: A test. A wager. A proof of your right to existence. Do not turn your wrath at us, we are merely the harbingers of a terrible inevitability.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: You must offer up only three of every four vaults.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Bestow us with a sign of your deference.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: We shall liberate you from false greed by stripping all that you covet.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Grant us a portion of that which you treasure.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Your soldiers wrap themselves in shadows, unaware that we see best in the darkness. Remove them immediately—or they may discover what else stalks the gloom.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: Branded by the carmine sigil, fate decrees them as our next prey. Will you join us on our hunt?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: We are of one mind. Farewell.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: You’ve wasted too many of our fortunes. Return when you are ready to listen, or return not at all.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: Fate will return you to us, singleton.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/FirstContact
entry.value:
Open your eyes, singleton. You are not dreaming—you are the dream. The old world is dead, your old self is dead, so who are you now? We were the Meek, the Silent, and the Accomplice. Individually we were no one, together we are god itself.

Woo us, fear us, worship us… these are all acceptable answers to the riddle of what you can do for us.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferAlliance
entry.value: It’s a rare thing for all of us to like someone—but you’re an exceptional individual.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferGift
entry.value: Destiny can be cruel, but it can also be kind. Have you not heard that luck is blind?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: Unburied treasure, untarnished regalia, and an unspoiled vision—all you need to claim your destiny.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: Take this. It’s a mere piece of your fortune to come.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: Here, the wealth of our nation for an uncrowned king.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: Not too much nor too little. This should be exactly what you need.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: Come, have a taste of our dark vision… you will appreciate us all the more.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace
entry.value: Our ends have already been written, and it is not today. Let us cease this pointless charade until the Inexorable demands it.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: Suns grow and turn to dust. Yet you live on. What is a war to one such as thee?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: A crown rolls down a hillside, a head following. A new Queen sits high on the stones. A queen of peace and calm. The previous queen's body is dragged away.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: The clouds descend atop the pass. A sword thrust into the lightning. A smile on the face of a child as the skies clear.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Fall and rise and fall again. You are stuck in a loop outside of our control. The excession awaits between worlds. The answer isn't what you want—be at peace.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Six wives of a king there were, three and three. None lived, ultimately. But then who does? Shall we six attempt to do so?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Of the people, no-one cared. Not the king, not the priest, not the one trodden underfoot as the crowd surged. War had gone and all were bereft.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Empty, empty man. All the world's riches and sins will never fill you. Take a moment to contemplate your hellbound descent.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Crowned head, sleep easy tonight. Your war is yours to dispose of now. No anarchs shall threaten your sweet dreams…

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Round and round and round you go. More than you know.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Prince of Coins, your chest gapes empty. It consumes all, yet hollowness remains. Cease your labors and it shall close itself.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Talk carefully to the Romantics. Macbeth was a romantic and he listened ill to the three. Bring us peace, Romantic, and we shall speak in tongues again.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: The villain, smiles and sharp lapels, ate the world, then slept beneath his home, waiting to emerge when we were desperate enough. Cease our feud, attend to your woes.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: A god's seed rose, changed, from the waves as Love itself. Conquered craft. Conquered war.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: The spirit walks inside us all. Yet three-in-one stand together; one-in-two stands alone. We cannot fight it, but we do not love it.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: Pincers and tongs build a heart from cogs and wires. A rictus grin on an automat screen. Three stand, indecisive, choosing which damnation follows.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: A four-tusked elephant. A gold-toothed idol. A tree bearing seven embalmed hearts. The signs do not lie—if we trade caravans, then all our fortunes will increase.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Praise
entry.value: Four hearts, two minds, moving as one. We three raise you to the stars, %3%!

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Praise/ArmorOfFaith
entry.value: That is more than a mere confidence trick. You have bound that soul around thrice countergyre and something has taken hold. They need not fear, for now.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Praise/MothersFavor
entry.value: One is jealous. One is awed. One wonders at the wisdom gained. All bow to how deep another has gone.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Praise/Trapped
entry.value: The fool dangles, hanged, from an ivory tower. Inside, the priestess watches the world turn and burn. Priestess, do not emerge. Lost secrets are all around you, waiting to be found.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/Praise/Undying
entry.value: So mundane, stolid you are… yet something touched you, an excession, and now you are… other. Suns will die before you do, cursing in the cold vacuum of the death heat.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/PraiseWar
entry.value: A hand falls onto broken tiles. The old hermit has seen it before, seen all the paths. What is it, to live through this again. And again. And again?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectAlliance
entry.value: We asked you who you are when we first met, not a name but a destination, and your answer was a cacophony of defiance. We cannot form a coven with you, not until you discover true surrender.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Tread carefully, mortal. You, who think the stars are infinite, the horizon distant, and that time is endless… you cannot hope to advise those who see the horrific truth.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: No, not that one. Our bond shall endure until the stars are extinguished from the sky.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: We know how this path ends. We once offered an old king a wish. Whatever he wished for though, we would also grant his neighbor—but doubled. The king thought of money, then health, then power. Finally, he asked for one of his eyes to be blinded.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: We asked them our riddle, not a name but a devotion, but their reply proved them insular. They are not ready for the truth of our coven.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: The thunder of colliding comets, the gargle of blood and choking, a eulogy of beetles clacking on bones… Keep your gift, your future is ill omen enough.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: No matter what you may offer, you cannot sway what has already been set in motion.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: What use do we have for your limited sight when the shadows hold no mystery?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: You seek to sway fate with mere trinkets and trifles? We only care to tend the hearth of the Inescapable.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: Nothing you do will alter the continuity. We only ask that you bear witness, not gifts.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectPeace
entry.value: It is the nature of all things to gravitate towards their end. We are only assisting your journey.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Can you not hear the claws of the vermin scurrying inside our walls? Only when our house is cold, still, and dark can we truly rest.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Four broken rings. A girl covered by cement and mud. Dried ichor crusted on a shriveled homunculus. We cannot accept this, we risk ruin if they make it to the Devourer’s arrival.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: Hollow echoes are all that fill your empty coffers. Return to us when your worth is greater.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You would fracture our bonds, break our clan, and shatter our sorority. And all over what? The jangle of coin and bone?

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: We are but agents of the Unavoidable, and it has marked this one for prosperity.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: The wealth of the cosmos is granted in eons… nothing of this world can hope to compete.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: We know of your partners better than you. Take care, for the nymphs you chase will grow into locusts.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: This is beyond even us. Why waste your breath on fortune when you should seek power, for in the vast scale of the universe only one remains everlasting.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: Rage and tear all that you wish, but the universe cares not for your wants—and neither do we.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: We are but players on a stage, directed by the script of greater beings. It’s only you who must accept it.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You are no god. We cannot slumber idly as you move the world to your design.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Conflict arises from ignorance—and we know too much to be caught in your simple schemes.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: You drag us to the perihelion of demise. Suffer your own hubris, singleton.

entry.name: FurtiveTribunal/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: What must you keep after giving it to someone? Answer this, and you’ll know why our bond must be broken.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Why do you hesitate? Now is the time to stoke the flame.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: Your loyalty has proven stronger than steel. Together, let’s burn out the impurities from this land.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: And to think… I once considered us unbreakable. When did our bond grow so brittle?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Indeed, %3% has become a flaw in my plans. I will cast them off—but that doesn’t mean I’m ready to grind them down.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: A chain is only as strong as its weakest part… which link would you have me sunder?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: A worthy choice, one that I had not considered. Unkindly, you remind me that my perfection is incomplete.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I prefer to craft my own relationships… perhaps you’ve found me a diamond in the rough. Who?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Regards, architect!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: You dare interrupt my great work!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: State your proposal.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: True leaders know that their path is right when fools curse them.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Truly, a bright believer! Your contribution will be etched onto a silver spine and admired forever in our annals.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: The pursuit of perfection consumes vast resources. What do you offer my project?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: Yes, I would rather toil in my foundries than dissect your lands—now let’s see what you’re made of…

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Very well, I’ll make the transfer. Now, let us finalise our design.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: I require your assistance. And you lack materials. What would… light your fire?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptPeace
entry.value: One must elevate oneself above primal savagery. There are far better uses for the resources we’ll save.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: An interesting example. Very well! Your vision doesn’t match my own—but I will grudgingly admit to improvement.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I see a flaw that must be excised, but you… you see something different? Who is it that you strive to preserve?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptPraise
entry.value: True praise would be to follow in my footsteps. To submit. But I will take it.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: Sustain my quotas and our arrangement will be ideal. But I must warn you—my craft demands an ever-increasing amount of supplies!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: A pity you weren’t up to the task. But the machine starves for materials—and I must feed it no matter the means…

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: It is as you say. Thank you, your assessment removed an imperfection in my workflow!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I don’t care about being wrong, but I do care about being right. Name the flaw in my supply chain that I may purge it!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: An unorthodox suggestion… but a correct one. Thank you, your ingenuity remains impressive.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I’ve already formed an agreement with every reliable supplier. Who do you think I missed?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: You dare to demand so much, knowing how fatal it will be to my progress?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: You’re taking advantage of my flawed defenses… Excellent, you’re a model worth studying. Now how much do you want?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: My forces were only searching for new building materials. I will melt down the offending troops—the next batch will be improved.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptWar
entry.value: You have impeded my progress long enough. It was a mistake to utilize refined methods—it’s time to burn away the impurity!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: You possess a keen eye for weakness… Very well, it’s the perfect time to expunge this impurity!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Excellent timing, my latest masterpieces yearn for a field test! Who should we try ourselves against?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AdmitDefeat
entry.value: Congratulations to my conquerors… But it will not matter what is accomplished from here. Without me, humanity is doomed to extinction… If not from the monsters of this world, then famine… pestilence… age… Don’t you see? My projects… must be continued. We… we must transcend…

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AskForProposals
entry.value: Time is a treasure. Do not spend mine unwisely.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: Given that your race is slowly dying merely by living here, it seems unlikely but: do you have the capacity to support my group?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: I am loathe to admit weakness to one such as you. But… perhaps you will take pleasure in my humbling and that will be payment enough for your aid.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: It is proving inefficient to spend my own resources on my population's survival. Do you have any interest in aiding them?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/CancelAction
entry.value: This proposal lacks perfection… Alterations are necessary.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Condemn
entry.value: Not even mistakes—you flee the ideal, chasing soft humanity. Fool.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Condemn/HeartfeltLoss
entry.value: It seems your weakness is contagious. I recommend you excise your bleeding heart, lest it weaken your people more. I am happy to help with the operation…

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Condemn/Independent
entry.value: A solitary intent, I can understand. Yet one must integrate with others to most effectively exploit them—and striving for apotheosis is only worthwhile if one has peers to look down upon. To see where one came from.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Condemn/JustShipIt
entry.value: You are so far from perfection. This falls apart in my hands.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Condemn/LeaveNoManBehind
entry.value: So profligate, your commitment to these plebian lives. There is an art in not caring—in freeing yourself so that they may contribute to something greater than their own petty hedonism.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: Truths in amalgam behave reliably, predictably. Yet you are an unalloyed liar. I will treat you as such.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: Continue to associate with %3% at your peril. There is no limit to the souls I will waste if I must.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: You are quite the annoyance. The work I have lost with %3% sets back my plan again. And the resources—mineral, technology, human. Tch.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: An admirable attempt. At reaching efficiencies by other means. Sadly ineffective. You are so, so below perfection.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: An interesting trade. To associate with %3% at the cost of our relationship. Do you think me so feeble?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/CondemnWar
entry.value: Resources burned, militaria destroyed, infrastructure degraded… war is wasteful on the path to perfection.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: Alien, you are extraneous to this world. Your people are a mess, a canker on its possible perfection. I must excise all of you.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: Barbarian. You are marred and unkempt. I cannot have this dirt in my perfect world. It must be removed.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Your synthetic arrangement is unique. It’s a shame we couldn’t collaborate—I’ll still gain much from studying your scrap.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: I long to study you—your remorseless drive to live, your regeneration from obliteration. I will have to take you by force to do so, I see.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Three is surely redundant? One should suffice. Or perhaps none, once I have taken your lands, your resources. And broken your people's faith.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: What needs to be said? We are of a kind. We both know that the one whose aesthetic is more progressive, more vigorous—that one will survive and flourish. The other will gladly step aside.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: An effective tool. Brutal like a claw hammer. But a worn tool becomes a liability. It must be destroyed utterly, to be reforged.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Honor? A worthless concept of worthless hearts. If an organism or machine is malfunctioning, equally, we dispose of them. Like I shall presently with you.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Oh, now you. You are a treasure. I will carry you personally, gently, to my machines, and vivisect you, oh, so slowly.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: I trust you expected this. It is just good business, after all.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: You have insulted my aesthetic for the last time. Keep your Millais and Rossetti—I will take Frank Lloyd Wright, Jonny Ive and Oppenheimer. And crush you with them.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: They are so messy, your intrusions. And you think them clever. You are verminous, scuttling in the wreck of greater works, made by greater people. I do not—can not—stomach vermin in my perfect world.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: So far from perfection are you sunk fallen that to tread you underfoot is almost an obligation. Vermin.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: You are so far from perfect, child. I should cull you now, before your design becomes more… aberant.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: I do admire, you machine. Yet that does not mean I cannot see the potential for improvement—both in your workings and in myself, should I eliminate you.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Unbind yourself… one should not allow another’s rusted shackles to restrain one, to tarnish your own quality.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: An alloy is stronger than its individual elements; you would do well to bond your forces with those of another.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: Your request is far from ideal. If you want me to follow your design, compensation will be required for its inefficiencies.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Only a vast amount of materials will fuel my passion for this!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Just a tiny spark will light my passion.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: To ignite my passion for this, you’ll have to give me everything you have.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: I’ll need a good deal to get my passion burning.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Your war threatens the foundations of my work! Stop immediately—or I’ll be forced to step in!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Why waste your supplies on their crude efforts? Your gifts are squandered on straw monuments.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: You should begin exchanging supplies with others. It’ll not only benefit you, but my great works as well.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandTribute
entry.value: The cornerstones of our partnership are lacking… but fortunately for you, so are my materials.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: It will be expensive, but otherwise our foundation will crumble!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Only a little is needed to reinforce our foundation.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: It will take everything you have to prevent us from fragmenting!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: A moderate amount is required to sustain our foundation.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: And I thought that I knew no restraints. Your forces are too close. Withdraw them, or I’ll take them as test subjects.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: A certain someone is an obstruction to us both. My tools can’t deal with them, but you’ve displayed a talent for war craft—it’s time you truly tested yourself!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: You’ve left me inspired, architect!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: My patience with you grows brittle…

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: Do you hear screams? Me neither. Hmm. I must begin a new batch.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/FirstContact
entry.value:
Ah. My latest obstacle. Welcome. You should know who I am—who you are fighting against.

I am a seeker of perfection—notably, the perfection of the human form. My chosen path is straightforward, but it does require a painful amount of dedication. Rejoice when you hear the screams, however, for you know my empire is growing ever more ideal.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferAlliance
entry.value: Few naturally integrate so well into my designs—and fewer still can improve them. Should we combine forces and bring perfection to this land?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferGift
entry.value: Your presence galvanizes me to ever greater productivity, so it’s only right that I share my surplus with you.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: The amount is great, but I’ve seen your many projects—and I want them all to succeed.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: Take this. It doesn’t seem like much—but it’s just the right amount.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: Rejoice, for this is everything I possess! How else am I to show that I’m as invested in your great works as my own?!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: Here’s a good amount. I’ve seen what you’re working on, and I want to help you complete it.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: I desire nothing more than to focus on my work, but my material needs require that I constantly explore. Let’s exchange maps, then neither of us would need to waste time on this trivial endeavor.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace
entry.value: I do not like the dents this war makes in my lustre. Let’s end this quarrel so we might return to our greater work.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: I have lost interest in your ancient artifacts. We should do something else.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: I have experimented enough on your captive friends. A fine transaction, this. Thank you.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: I can't bear to fragment that unique synthetic symmetry that makes you up. Perhaps I'll come back to that later.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: As fascinating as it is to watch you die, over and over, I have work to be getting on with.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: There is something in you, something fundamental to the design of the human psyche, this Mithraic three-in-one. I must leave you alive to study this more.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Our forces are at a standstill. A peace, for a time, until one of us surpasses his twin.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Your constant raiding irritates me. As do the 3 am taunts on the diplomatic radio. Perhaps we could contemplate a break in our… relations.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: My design is nearing completion and I have no need of this war. You may have it with someone else, instead.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: I insist that you stop hurting my people to stop your people hurting. You waste my resources!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: I do not know how to say this, so I will be blunt. Our hollow hearts would be better deployed against others.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: I am throwing a ball and I would have you attend, perhaps even read your doggerel. Of course, you'll need to call the armies off first.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: Who are you again? An opponent? I'd quite forgotten we were at war. Should we continue?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Oh, your form is remarkably efficacious, despite its aesthetic failings. I must muse on what this means for my project.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Child-savior. There is an ancient aesthetic delight to your clashing concepts, one I would rather preserve. If you withdraw your forces, I shall do so too.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: Your designs may be inelegant—indeed, they are aesthetically repugnant—but their effectiveness is undenaible. I ask for time to study them and improve…

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: Should our economies be joined, they’ll be equally strengthened. But don’t worry if a few of your traders go missing… I’ll compensate you well for the materials!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Praise
entry.value: A step closer to perfection, cutting away flesh, emotion, amity. One cannot but admire you!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Praise/Honorbound
entry.value: An economy is naught but a machine and your adherence to principles and duties… this is lubricant to the machine You are its heart.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/Praise/WeWhoAreAboutToDie
entry.value: Wise, to broadcast the war. I would not use it for entertainment, but for intimidation. But motivated workers all the same.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/PraiseWar
entry.value: Not all components are salvagable. Some pieces are, frankly, only fit for the trash. Or the smelter.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectAlliance
entry.value: This would only serve to drag me into unnecessary wars. I see past your peaceful facades, and I’m not fooled!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I’ve forged my links into an invincible armor. It’s foolish of you to think that I would break it myself.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Why would I seek to crumble my own base? %3% has been a key pillar to my ambition—far more than you as of late!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I am the grand architect—why would I ever allow you to plot my designs?!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: … Unsubstantiated advice from a coarse mind. You would do well to stop here, before I desire to make you my next project.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: Such a lowly ‘gift’ isn’t worth interrupting my work. Come back when your offer can kindle my interest!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: My masterpiece can only remain perfect if it’s pure and untainted from outside influence—so take your ‘gift’ elsewhere!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: No, what you’re offering me is a sketch—what I desire is a full blueprint!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: I refuse! For that much, I’m willing to draw up an entirely new plan!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: Forget it, any amount I give you would be wasted!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectPeace
entry.value: No. Our relations are irreparable. Take solace in the fact that I’ll recast your broken flesh into a far more ideal form!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You find my methods deplorable, but some flaws require sanding—while others must be carved out!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: You dare ask me to stop when I’m on the brink of completing my plan? No, I think not.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: No, I have enough right now for all my works. And where surplus sits idle, order decays.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: While you seek to demolish foundations, I remain a true builder. Just ignore whatever screams you may hear—it’s all part of the process!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I don’t mind chopping off an arm, but only if there’s an upgrade. And severing trade with %3% seems like a clear downgrade to me.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I cannot see you crafting anything better than I can myself—trade agreements included.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Their past dealings are known to me… so why would I ever bother with such a worthless being?

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: Ask me for blood, beg me for flesh—those I would give you in abundance… but these resources I cannot give up!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: You, demanding tribute from me? Amusing! You should be begging me for succor instead—and I would still laugh!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Do you really think I misplaced my forces? No, my plans are always perfect—you just haven’t realized why yet.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Why destroy when we can create? While biological life is inferior, it’s still a resource—and war is the greatest waste of all resources!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Don’t think you can push me into a war with %3%. Although I am malleable, it doesn’t mean I’m soft!

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: Our collaboration remains uneven, and so I must sever it. The grand projects we envisioned can still be achieved—but only after you improve your state.

entry.name: HeartlessArtificer/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: I have completed a key project, so my material needs have altered. Our arrangement is no longer necessary.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: What's up? Killing time?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: Working together to smash up the world? Damn straight.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: Oh, I see! You want WAR! With ME? Yes! Let us test our fury! Our endurance! Spill our vital fluids!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: %3%? Coulda been more fun, I guess, always hiding in my shadow. Let's give 'em a real taste of the world!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Hnf! Get rid of a lifting buddy or two? Wonder who you think can't match my tonnage.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Hahaha, sure! I'll get them to work up a sweat!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Hmph. Better be a lifter.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Bud! Let's go for a ride!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: What a drag.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Ain't in the club. Talk.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: Fuck you. You don't get to fucking judge me.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: I come in there, I could take more. But I'm working on my people skills.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: What have you got that I couldn't just take?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: There are more lands to conquer? Tell me.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: That feels good and heavy in the hand. Solid. Honest.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: Huh. You're negotiating? With me? You've got some guts after all.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Let me be clear. I do not want this. I will hate you forever for making me say this. But… yes. Peace, it is.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: I assume this is part of some huge plan where we tag-team %3% down the line?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: That's a big ask. I'm working on building a throne of bones, you know. Need my suppliers.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptPraise
entry.value: Damn straight, I'm the best! C'mon chest bump me! CHEST BUMP ME!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: Always need more. Bike parts, fuel, ammo. Gotta feed the war machine!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: Heh. I know how this goes. A prelude to total war, right? I'm waiting…

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: %3% never really understood. Want to trade with %1%, you gotta call me right. Lord, Wall, Lord of Wall. Not just Warlord.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Never was a big fan of barter. Only thing I like swapping is punches.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Ugh, fine. As long as I don't have to talk to them more.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Coinage? Haggling. Leave it to the vegetarians. Meat-eaters don't trade.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: I see. Bulgarian method, eh? Stress and relax the muscle. Fine.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: Smart. You caught me in a moment of weakness. What's it going to cost to make you forget you noticed?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: They were pulling back anyway. Just a sweep to see if we could drum up any fun.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptWar
entry.value: Now that's what I'm talking about. War… war abides.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Honestly, I would have fought anyone. But %3%? That's just a cherry on top.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I'm rounding up the troops. Corralling our steeds. But where we're going?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AdmitDefeat
entry.value:
Well, look at you. All grown up. And with just the right number of guns pointed at me. Well done.

Now, you know that I'll not deign to live. I won't be paraded through your cities a new Vercingetorix, a chieftain in chains.

So. I'm going to unbutton my holster. And in five seconds, I'm going to go for it. Then you'll be the hero that killed the monster personally. And I get to live on in legend and bedtime tales.

Five. Four. Three. Tw-

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AskForProposals
entry.value: Any more opinions you wanna share?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: Anchor-dude. How's the rock-top life? Listen, can you spare any of your rad warriors for my crusade? Don't leave a dude hanging…

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: Yeah, yeah, can already hear you shoutin' 'humiliation', whilst you chew your blade. But I know you'll always help a like soul.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: Always respected you, Rossum. Made of fine chrome and bolts, like my Bess. How'd you feel about me?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/CancelAction
entry.value: Hey, careful with the beverage!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Condemn
entry.value: Hey, stop that. RIGHT NOW. Else, I… I'll kill ya! Bare-handed! HEAR ME?!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Condemn/DarkOmen
entry.value: When a man is trying to over-run a city before the gates get shut, he really does not appreciate fuckin' psychics spoilin' the surprise. How's that fuckin' fair?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Condemn/Gluttony
entry.value: Human slug! You wouldn't have a lasted a day up here, during the worst of the war… Did you just fuckin' Pavlovian-salivate when I said 'wurst'?!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Condemn/MilitaryBackground
entry.value: Ha! Jumped-up serf, is what you are! Webbing and guns that match your undies, saying yes when the fuckers say jump. Enjoy your fuckin' life.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Condemn/Trapped
entry.value: What, you can't even fuckin' move? What's to stop me just nukin' your ass where you sit? Don't you get… itchy?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: Did you think we wouldn't notice? That we wouldn't remember? You just painted a giant target on your head.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: Hoo-hoo. You and %3%. I gotta smash both of you now?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: Hey! I wanted to destroy %3% myself!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: Butt out, cow-puncher. Don't need your weasel words.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: Why you swapping shit with %3%? Isn't my shit good enough? I'll make you eat my shit before you die.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/CondemnWar
entry.value: You started a war and you didn't invite me?!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: Your war made me, pa. Freed me from being a desk jockey dreaming of Fight Club, made me my glorious self. Only fair I give you a similar opportunity for, uh, personal growth.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: You want it. I want it. Let's skip the chatter.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: I'll treat you with the same respect I treat all fellow human beings with. Which is to start a war…

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Hoo-hoo, misery guts, I'm coming for you. We're a match made in heaven—you can't die and I can't stop killin'!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Ladies. I know you've been dying to get physical with me. So let's do it.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Missy, why're you lookin' for perfection? I'm right here. And I'll fight anyone who disagrees. Startin' with you!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Wanna quick… war?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Dude looks like a punchbag, dude needs to get used to being a punchbag. I'll hang you outside my gate, so everyone can have a go.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Count, eh? I'll give you a count, then I'll start the hunt. One. Two… Here I come!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Fuck your freedom tax. Freedom wants to be free!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value:
Bones is Red, Violence is Blue, War is sweet,
It comes for you.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: Bit tired of you skulkin' in your hidey-hole, hoarding all that stuff. Gonna crack it open, drag you out, make you share it.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: Fucking hee-har! You look soft and weak, but I'm betting you're going to put up a good fight! I hope someone will anyway.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Step away, little boy. A real man's gonna show you how the world works.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: Sorry, robopal. Need to break you and yours down for parts.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: So look. If a pal of yours was going down, would you hang around them? Or would you back off?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: You ain't worth killing on your own. Why don't you do a team-up, so you can show me a real fight?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: Sure, but I got a rider. And not just a basket of blue candies.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Have you seen fuel prices these days? I'm running on fumes here.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Just to show willing, you know.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Look. Either you give me everything. Or I come over there and take it, and your lives too.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Heck, I don't care. Fucking quibbler. Give me half.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Hold off punching them. Give them a chance to recover. Much sweeter fight that way, when they have hope again.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: That trade route? I need to ride my bike through there.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: Piggies need fattening before the slaughter.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandTribute
entry.value: Tribute! Gold for the fallen king! Haha! Gimme, gimme.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: I'll leave you some. Enough to get by on.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: I just need enough for some gas.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: I'll have it all, one way or another.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: It's not extortion, per se. I'm not taking everything.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: If you pull those guys back a bit, it'll make our motorbike charge look fucking A!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: Why wouldn't you want a war? Are you some kinda peacenik? Get in there and fight!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Go, enjoy! Kill something!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Let my boot help you out.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/FirstContact
entry.value:
What? What? Do I look like I want to chat? I'm watching the live feed of my guys shooting up your-

Okay, okay. We can talk. I'm %1%. And this… this is paradise!

Remember that old world with its concrete, debt, governments, yearbooks, schedules… ugh. It just crushed you.

So kick back on your bike, have a fancy drink with fruit in, shoot anyone who won't get out the way.

You aren't in the way… are you?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferAlliance
entry.value: Am impressed—your boys do everything well, fightin', killin'… even liftin'. I could do with you at my side, like a spotter. Whaddya say?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferGift
entry.value: Don't think this means I'm going soft on ya.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: You need this. You deserve it. Just don't forget who helped when it matters.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: Just a taste. Need to keep you hungry.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: I don't need this shit. I don't need anything! I need a bike and my fist! Take it all!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: How about this? Get you on your feet and fighting.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: I gotta show you this! We've been all over this place.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: Too plain weird to fight your boys, right now. You stay right there while I go look for bigger guns.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: Wait, wait… just need some breathin' space before another round?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Hmph. Didn't think you'd last this long. Immovable object holds off irrestible force. Okay. I'll come back later.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Ah, you're boring. Why won't you die? Gonna find somebody's who fun to fight.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Damn, ladies. You sure messed with my head. I'm gonna go put my feet up then try someone else.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Shit-for-heart. You taken my lesson on perfection, yeah? You get it? So let's leave it.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Phew! Like punching a lead mirror. Okay, break, whilst we go… ravage something else.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Okay, okay. I'll try the steak. Does it come with fries?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Gramps, you're getting kinda dull. Like to try my fist out on someone tougher. You get?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Lily-livered, scumbaggin' gold-diggin' wuss… be back to knock your teeth down your throat later.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Got enough material for my saga yet? Y'know, 'gain glory or die' or 'sing the rage of Achilles'. I can give you time?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: Were we fighting? Huh. I didn't notice. Maybe I'll go fight someone else.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Might take your advice. Find another road to go down.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: I ain't been beaten by a child! I just… Aw, hell.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: Beep. Beep. Boop. Blah. Blah. Whatever, let's just stop, okay?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: Feel like we could do better swapping stuff. I need jerky, fuel and water. For the road.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Praise
entry.value: FUCK YEAH. C'mon! You can do it! Kick their teeth in!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Praise/AgelessHunger
entry.value: Endless hunger? Good excuse for killing, that. Do I get to watch?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Praise/FoundationsOfBlood
entry.value: Damn, girl. You spilled more blood than me. Like it was nothing though. Even your own folks!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/Praise/HitAndRun
entry.value: Hoo-ee! That's some slick driving! How'd you do that? I need to learn that trick…

entry.name: HollowWarlord/PraiseWar
entry.value: War! Yeah. What is it good for? Absolutely everything!

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectAlliance
entry.value: Nah. If I do that, I can't bring the horde to your door. And that day will come.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: My gang is loyal. I'm loyal too. I ain't strippin their colours on your say-so.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Oh, hell no. I like %3%! Sure, they're no innocent, but when it comes to a fight, they're right there with me.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I ride alone, stranger.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I never seen %3% on wheels. And my gang is all on wheels.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: Nah. What am I gonna do with that?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: Ha, nah. I don't need that shit.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: We been everywhere! Haha! You ain't gettin' shit from me.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: You gotta learn how to ask, nice-like. No-one's dancin' for that.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: We're still talking? I don't- this is too much. Too complicated.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectPeace
entry.value: PEACE?! Hahaha.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: PEACE?! Hahaha.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: PEACE?! With %3%?! Hahaha.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: I had enough logistics in my desk-jockey days. Now I'm fuckin Conan. Conan don't do logistics.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Nah, I need all this shit! Burns real nice at night.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Where the shit am I going to get diesel, except from %3%? You expect me to just dig it up or something?

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Do I look like I'm waiting to get married or something? Fuck that.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Who? Really? Nah.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: I'm not giving you that! I need that for, uh. Me-time.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: No fucking way. That stuff really ties the room together.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Line in the sand, dude. Line in the sand.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You trying to tell me who I can or can't fight? You're heading for a world o' hurt.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: You have no frame of reference here. Like a kid wandering into the middle of war…
