entry.name: HollowWarlord/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: Sorry pal. I gotta ride! And you're holding me back.

entry.name: HollowWarlord/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: Got enough shit. Don't need any more shit.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Hurry. I’m beginning to lose my appetite.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: I always thought of us as two peas in a pod. It is about time we formed our own league…

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: Our partnership grows stale. It’s best we go our separate ways, before it turns to rot.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Hmm… I’ve had my fill of %3%, and it’s left me wanting. I shall act on your wise counsel.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: My table does grow crowded… but who would you have me invite to leave?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Ahh, me and %3%—a most potent recipe indeed! I accept your hearty invitation!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Now now, I won’t break bread with just anyone! Who shall you have me invite to the feast?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Ahh, mein kumpel! Tell me you’re coming for dinner!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Make it quick. You’re ruining my meal.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Hail fellow, well met!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: Such words are normally accompanied by a challenge to pistols at dawn.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Hear, hear! Let us toast to your generous and magnanimous spirit!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: Oh! Just as I grow bored—what delicacies have you brought me?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: Very well, I’d rather you survey my estates from afar than have your armies tromp through my fields.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Ahh, I’ve definitely got that in my larders! Very well, I’ll send over this side dish—just be sure you show up for dinner!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: There’s something about my offer that’s still unappetizing? Perhaps if I add the right seasoning…

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Our war grows tired and our people grow thin. It’s time we broke bread between us.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Yes, it’s time we cleared the table. Let us cease the war parties and start the dinner parties!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: You’ve caught me while I’m sated. On whose behalf do you sue for peace?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptPraise
entry.value: It seems someone else also has excellent taste.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: My people want for nothing, yet it’s foolish to dine alone when we can prosper together!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: So you wish to weather it alone, ja? Don’t complain to me when your pantry grows empty.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: My trades with %3% bear only lemons—and I grow weary of lemonade. You’re right, it’s time to take my business elsewhere.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: You’re right! Too many mouths to feed… but who do I uninvite?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: It’s hard to find partners worth their salt, but I’m willing to give %3% a chance.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Ahh, I’m always in the mood for more exotic fare! You have a reliable supplier to recommend me?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: And here I thought I was the gourmand… I hope you’re capable of checking your appetite.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: You seem a touch hangry… how much would it take to satisfy you?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I would never deign to trespass on another’s domain! We shall pull back immediately.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptWar
entry.value: So eager to eat crow, ja? Fine, but when I’m through with you, you’ll be the one eating out of a tube.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: The last time I hosted %3%… there were leftovers. Leftovers!! Such an insult to my chef is unforgivable—let’s obliterate this stain on my honor!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I would never deign to strike without proper cause… against who would I have cause to take offense?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AdmitDefeat
entry.value: Mein Gott… It cannot end like this! Extinguishing the last nobility left in the world… for who else but I could turn these unheimlich horrors into fine delights? Fine? Fine. My enemies think they can feast on my empire’s corpse? No! Greedy little vultures—they will choke on it!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AskForProposals
entry.value: More? I always have more time for deals.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: Anchorite, you understand privation where I do not. Can you stand by, knowing how my people suffer?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: I wonder which way your caprice will take you today? When I ask for aid. Towards generosity or towards malice?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: Machine. You understand better than most the importance of protocols. Of rules. I am bound to honour my debts. To do this, I need aid.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/CancelAction
entry.value: My sincerest apologies! I’m more focused on seasoning than reasoning.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Condemn
entry.value: This is not how things are done. Not noble. Not honorable. Not on the set menu. I urge you to cease.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Condemn/Abhorrent
entry.value: I am, ahem. Ugh, ahem. I cannot look upon you and keep down even a light supper. You provoke such wasteful sensations!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Condemn/DataHack
entry.value: This, I do not like. This bypassing of systems, without permission, is dishonorable. It is theft, pure and simple. I will not have it.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Condemn/Independent
entry.value: No, this will not do. The world is an interlocked lattice of agreements, and obsequies, and deals. One who stands apart, alone, undermines this—and provides a bad example to others. Come inside our network, I warn you.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: Deception and arbitrage go hand-in-hand… but to lie and to be CAUGHT in the lie? That is sheer folly.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: I should praise your instinct to work with another, even if I must criticize your choice. %3%, really? Oh, dear.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: Dear me, %3%? Gone? Where is your humanity? Your fellow-feeling?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: No, no, NO. This is exactly wrong. Where is your honour?!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: If you were going to trade with anyone… what am I, chopped liver? Instead, you barter with %3%…?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/CondemnWar
entry.value: Are there so many of us left alive that you waste more souls on a spat with %3%? Grow up.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: Ancient, my respect I proffer as always. Along with it, a declaration of war. You are not foolish enough to be surprised, I assume. Good.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: … you ate what?! Mein Gott—I must challenge you on behalf of all culinarians!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: I must apologize in advance for what we're about to do. I do sincerely regret it, yet I cannot let regret stay my hand, for then I would be paralyzed at all times. Prepare yourself for war, mind.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: I think you understand honor, yes? In that case you will intuit the web of obligations that has led me to this point. I do not choose war—my honor forces me into it. I hope that will be of solace to you.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Ladies. A kiss on the hand is politeness itself, chaste romance indeed. But a declaration of war? Ah, that's a commitment to meaningful, fiery relationship.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: You may not understand my duties, Artificer, or have empathy for the network of obligations that lead to them. But you will understand the mechanisms at least, that have led to this—to war between us.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: In the name of amity, I will forgive almost anything. But the way you ate those canapés. Without taking off your filthy glove, the fist cramming in an entire platter! Quince and Sauerkraut in one mouthful? You… you must be destroyed!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Ah, one who understands my perspective. I will not ask for titles, or a letter of introduction. But you do understand that there can be only one? Good.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: At least the NeoDuke has the gall to offend me directly. Your excellency, where is your nobility of action? I shall make it easy: a white glove to the face, a duel fought with armies at dawn.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Those who take themselves out of our systems of respect and friendship, lose the right to benefit from their rules. Still, I will abide by them—Sir. We are at war.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: My friend, I fear that you have let your emotional ties overcome your practical impulses. Honor compels me to bring you to battle and hence right this wrong. Do take it personally.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: Honor may be the refuge of rogues… say the rogues. I prefer to be honorable and clear, to have allies at my table, than to walk alone in the shadows. I hope a little war changes your behavior…

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: Madame, I must apologise. Your comestibles were most delightful, yet I am obliged by circumstance to commence hostile activities. I regret this deeply.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Even in this day, it saddens me that we cannot co-exist. Let us settle who controls all under heaven—the nobility or the church.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: Machine, mind… whatever you are. Rectitude impels me to stand against you, though it will put a crimp in my supply lines.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: I would not normally question your associations… yet you now risk your good repute. Cease your pact, lest you sully your noble tradition.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: There are times when we must do what is best for our land. To safeguard the prosperity of the realm, I must insist that you join in league.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: Alas, I wish I could just say yes, but I’m so famished you see. Perhaps if you offered me something more to chew on…

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: I’m going to need something meaty. What will you serve me as a main course?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: How about you serve me an appetizer?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Now, now, don’t be stingy. Empty your reserves—for nothing less than a feast will do!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Today I feel like starting with dessert… serve me something sweet.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: You know what’s bad business? Paying with blood instead of coin. Sue for peace before you’re bled dry.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: How can you remain content with small potatoes? What say you stop those exchanges and seek a partner offering better fare?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: Always the same ingredients in all your dishes… Perhaps it’s time you trade with someone new, ja?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandTribute
entry.value: You’ve lived beyond your means for too long. I think it’s time I called in your debts.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Deliver me a vast aid. Don’t force me to come collect.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Deliver me a small aid. Don’t force me to come collect.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Deliver all your goods to me. Don’t tarry—my armies would be delighted to collect it themselves.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Deliver me a worthy aid. Don’t force me to come collect.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I’m afraid you’ve brought too many guests. Send them back before you outstay my hospitality.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: They say what’s good for the goose is good for the gander, but a certain someone has outgrown us both. There are few things I love more than cooking a fat goose… wouldn’t you agree?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Let’s share a meal soon, ja?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Yech! Our calls always leave such a foul aftertaste… Now I require a palate cleanser.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/FirstContact
entry.value:
Hail foe, well met!

Though we are at war, you will find me a reliable, noble foe. And my allies always share in my wealth. Indeed, you must come over and try one of these deviled Abkluth eygs!

I do hope we can put this small war behind us, so that we might behave with honour to one another.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferAlliance
entry.value: Even in this nightmarish age, you’ve proven noble. What say we formalize our bond and create an invincible league—one that exemplifies the strength and prosperity we seek to return to the land?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferGift
entry.value: Mein vater always said that fortune shared is fortune doubled! Our last harvest was abundant, so I’d like to bestow a portion of the bounty on you!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: Now, now, I know it’s a vast amount but just accept it with grace! If you feel beholden, you can always think of it as an investment rather than a gift!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: It’s not much, but I hope it helps. If you feel beholden, you can always think of it as an investment rather than a gift!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: Please, you’re practically drooling! I know it’s an extravagant amount, but I’m truly invested in your prosperity!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: It’s merely modest, but I hope it helps. If you feel beholden, you can always think of it as an investment rather than a gift!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: Traveling the wastes is hard on our traders… we should make things easier for them and exchange our charts!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace
entry.value: I’ve no taste for blood when peace offers us much better harvests. So I’m offering you an olive branch… and I hope you’ll take it.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: I feel our aims would be better served by bonds of friendship than the exchange of fire. Especially given how near to extinction both our peoples are.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: My honor has been satisfied. I withdraw.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: This war consumes all, leaves nothing for us to enjoy. Shall we end it and renew our amity?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: You are a leader to your people. But that does not mean merely war. Even though it is your history, it does not need to be your future. Walk away from it and become better—I will show you the way.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Shall we four sit around a table. You bring the tarot, I shall bring the comestibles—and together we shall make better entertainment than that provided by war.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: I cannot appeal to your heart—there is none—or to your honor—I feel you lack that too. So I shall appeal to your aesthetic sense, that sees these resources wasted on destruction, not creation. Imagine what you could do with PEACE.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Neighbour, you are ruining my trade routes and putting me off my food. And I have a positively stinking farfaru that I must try. Come, share it with me and forget this puerile conflict.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Ah, a reasonable interlocutor at last. Shall we have the celebratory feast before or after the treaty?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Heinz, bring the good Alsace white! A toast, mein herr, to true nobility! And while you drink, perhaps consider this treaty..?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Mr Daed, a wagyu slider? This war is futile. Yes, take the whole platter. Just consider peace.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Let us cease our squabbles and draw ourselves closer together. I have a fine Chasse-Spleen here—it was your Byron's favourite. Let us raises glasses and toast friendship—or at least peace.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: Ugh. How do you live like that, dining on ICAR's ancient canteen stores? With peace, I could supply you fresh ingredients, chefs… or even instant ramen? We have a few much-prized packs remaining…

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Ah… fair… lady. I would stoop to kiss you on the hand and beg for peace, but my corporeality restrains me so.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Even in this day, it saddens me that we cannot co-exist. Let us settle who controls all under heaven—the nobility or the church—peacefully.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: Machine, as a noble of long descent, I am your superior. I order you to cease all military operations against my people and withdraw your wardens!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: My people want for nothing, yet… I hunger for exotic delights. Perhaps we could arrange for a mutuality pact?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Praise
entry.value: You are the host and we are but guests at your table, stunned by the banquet.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Praise/AgelessHunger
entry.value: You have my pity, friend, and my admiration. To never know satiation, that pleasing fullness when another wafer-thin morsel would 'Creosote' one across the room? But to endlessly consume…

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Praise/ArtificersPrecision
entry.value: I appreciate good engineering and this is fine indeed. Little wonder it inspires your followers so, being equipped with such nuanced tools. Quite a delight, I must say.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Praise/ResourceNetwork
entry.value: Scarcity, now that is the heart of economics—and of luxuries, that they are above all scarce goods. Yet here you are, able to winkle out secrets and trinkets long thought lost. You are a joy!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/Praise/TheSureThing
entry.value: Ah, when Duchess Marie and I used to play contract bridge, we were almost unbeatable. But a guaranteed win! Admirable, though surely it takes the fun out of the game?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/PraiseWar
entry.value: I trust a formal declaration was made, handed over by white-gloved officials of the state? If all is in order, then this war is to my taste indeed.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectAlliance
entry.value: You’ve treated me fairly, yet your armies display a worrying lack of chivalry… I would not care to sully my armies alongside yours as of yet.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Mein gott… You would have me tarnish my honor with this unprovoked treachery. My honor is my life.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Surely you jest. Only a hund would bite the hand that feeds them.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You’ve already given me too much food for thought… please allow me some time to digest.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: %3% has repaid me few favors in the past. How can I expect them to be a good ally when they lack basic reciprocity?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: For me to take from a pauper would insult us both. Save it for when you have more to give.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: … what’s that stench? Whatever you’ve brought along reeks of rot!

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: I’m afraid I can’t agree for now. There’s a hungry look in your eyes—and my larders are far too tempting.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: Schade! We could have shared such a delicious meal if you didn’t insist that only I foot the bill.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: You think I’ll give you silver platters for your half-baked pies? Sorry, but I can’t entertain this any further.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectPeace
entry.value: Peace? No, I’ve had my fill of peace. Now I… I have a hunger only blood will satiate.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I welcome you to my table, yet you spoil my mood with this rubbish? Come, let us speak of something else.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Were that I could… I tried the carrot, but I’m left with just the stick.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: Now now, there’s a limit to my nobility. I cannot feed my own people with what you’re offering me.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: At the risk of sounding rude, my business is none of your business. And we should keep it that way.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Tsk tsk. Why are you asking me, instead of them? I never attend a party that I’m not personally invited to.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You’ve already got a finger in every pie—so I think I’ll stick to my own recipes, danke sehr.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Perhaps your ovens lack fuel, for your advice came out half-baked.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: What you ask for is impossible… If you want us to starve, then we’d rather die fighting.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: Let us cease this Affentheater. We both know you’re asking for a tax—and that you’re not my liege.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I’m afraid my armies are right where they’re supposed to be. They’ll remain polite guests… as long as you remain a good host.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: The season is bountiful, every harvest’s a feast! There’s plenty to go around—so let’s not ruin the fields, ja?

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: My honor requires that I only participate in just wars… and this is not one.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: I cooked up such a lofty dream… an invincible league, with strength and honor that outshines even the stars. To obtain my dream, I must adjust my recipe—and you’re no longer an ingredient.

entry.name: HonorableAristocrat/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: Kale… Why must you insist on giving me kale… I shall suffer it no longer!! You’ve lost a patron today!!

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: As you wish. You are only wasting your own time.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: I must, mustn't I?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: So it goes. Our friendship shall endure such minor tribulations, I am sure.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Oh, %3% will be disappointed. But it will do them good to learn to cope.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I already know who you are going to say. But I must ask, else I will get a headache.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: But of course! My memory is far from perfect and all the jumping through time makes me forget the most significant things…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: You temporally bound do not always accept mandated friendships with good grace. I forget, who am I inflicting my presence on?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Even lost in infinity, how could one tire of your face?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: You are a persistent pest.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Once more we meet.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: I suppose, from your limited perspective, I am in the wrong?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Just the right amount. Key for my dark and melodramatic purposes… I jest, I jest.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: In this timeframe, I understand it to be normal to see a gift before one accepts it.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: It would be good to know where my whens are, this time.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: You know exactly how to sidestep all social expectations. Very well.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: Humor an old man. How much do you consider generous?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Peace is not merely a matter of words. It is an attitude. I hope you are ready to change.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Not all are ready for peace. For shared smiles and patient labor. But I myself will try.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I can have the conversation with them, at least. But you understand that conflicts will still remain. And my presence inspires conflict.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptPraise
entry.value: This tangled path, she is not easy to tread, this is true.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: I myself find my sustenance in other, better times. But those who live with me are in need of… revival.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: Am I such a drain? It is painful to see a friend step away so.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Poor %3%. I know they will never understand this betrayal. But remembering the tangled path of the future…? That is beyond me.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Who? Who should suffer?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: %3%? Such a surprise. Very well.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I forget, who will I have been dealing with? Assuming for the sake of argument this is the same timeline…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: I must do it this way, as it was always thus. But blackmail is so unbecoming.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: You must tell me the amount, even if I already know it. That's how this works.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Such a shame to disturb them… they were just settling themselves.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptWar
entry.value: You had no need to declare this. Unlike other relationships, war only takes one willing participant.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: %3%? You do not know how wise your actions will be. History will regard this favorably.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: We are making history here, my friend. Which, as everyone knows, is mostly powerful men sending others to their death… who?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AdmitDefeat
entry.value:
An end, at last! An end to the loops, the tunnels, the confusion. That timeless horror of the Voice, of the gods lost in it. An end to suffering, to the death of the dearest and nearest!

Oh, an end much to be desired!

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AskForProposals
entry.value: Neverending, this. Yet I always listen to you.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: We two, tangled differently in time. What does determinism look like from your umwelt? Is helping me even a choice for you?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: Ah, you are… magnificent! Magnificent. You could make an old beast like me purr. But for that to happen, my dear, I must survive.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: You are pattern-trained, my friend. So perhaps a prompt of the right kind… 'We are hungry. Cold. Please donate today.'

entry.name: InfiniteCount/CancelAction
entry.value: Forgive… for a moment, I was in another time. Another place. Better, of course.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/Condemn
entry.value: Whenever I am, you are the same. I grow tired of your puerility.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/Condemn/Abhorrent
entry.value: In the galleries and palazzos of Firenze, so many Venuses. From Melos, Capua, Knidos… To find a form like yours, though, I must evoke Bosch, Goya, Fuseli. Not to my taste, you see.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/Condemn/ThereIsHope
entry.value: Fine speeches, my poet friend. But I have seen your past and I know what you did. Your words are dust, next to the gore on your hands.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: Are you a fool? This cannot work. Not with %3%? But why should you listen to someone just because they have literally seen it all before…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: Ah, I remember this. The numberless dead, the smoking ruins, your lack of remorse. Humanity sidling closer to extinction. Are you proud, my friend?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: Do not concern yourself with my matters. Their path is set.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: You are who you break bread with, my friend, please remember that.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/CondemnWar
entry.value: It is striking to me that you consider murder and mayhem as, you know, an effective problem-solving technique. Striking, I say.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: It would cause too many problems to not do this, even if we had a choice. You understand my position, I think, with your endless present infinitives…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: Madame, you were charm itself at our wine tasting. And I forgive your massacres. But what you did to the Virgin and Child in my private gallery… art will not stand for it.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: How do two such as we come to such a point? How can the railroad lines of fate lead to our conflict? Understanding, it is beyond me. I must just follow the tracks and despair.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Noble warrior. It is time for you to be blooded anew. For the arena to sing your prowess.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Excuse me, I mistook you for the fates. I know them well, though Clotho has tangled me and Atropos yet shuns me. This war will be a hitch in your weft…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: There is no shame such as a life wasted. If you knew joy in your pursuit of perfection, then we would not have to come to this. But pain without sadism at least? Abhorrent.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Why soften it? You have been craving this moment.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: War is hereby declared between %2% and %1% and the dependents thereof.' There, I felt we would both appreciate the proper formalities.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Ah, myself. I think I remember this moment. Funny, I don't remember being this… old?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: My dear boy, there are lines that even I would not cross. But that you blithely stomp over, secure in your egocentricity. In simple terms, you have offended me and mine. War is the result.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: We understand each other well enough. I encourage you to find solace in the poetry of Ungaretti, however suspect his morals.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: The view from satellites, eh? How is it, knowing the present like I know the future? In parts, fragmented, impossible to grasp? I am intrigued. I am coming to see for myself.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: War comes, daughter. I will restrain my troops as best I can. Still, I urge you to protect your family best. Submit, sue for peace.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Little one, at the other end of life's journey. Change your ways, lest you never reach my age. I will send my men, to aid in that education.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: You already know, Machine. What use are these formalities with such as you? But what would I be, if not for rituals—for control?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: This knot you have tied, it cannot hold. Cut it now!

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: I do not remember you alone in the future. I swear there was another…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: Hear that synovial crack as I kneel to beg? I jest of course, I bow to no-one. But I do need incentives.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Give me a sign of sunken time. Or lives well-spent.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: A symbol of mutual affection, nothing more.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: I know every last lira in your account. They are old friends, so why not reunite them with me?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Something, not everything. I do not seek to beggar you.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: You are like a Sicilian, you think yourself master of every subtle art. But it is not wise, this thing you do.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: My friend, all your trade brings you is humiliation. I myself would not accept that…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: When oceans rise, you would be wise to have… someone to break bread with.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandTribute
entry.value: This, I know. That you have no choice over the answer to this demand. I have already seen it.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Considering my foreknowledge, I know this amount works. You will not be left utterly destitute.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: A pittance. Just a symbol of faith in my design.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Leave not a centime. I will know, you know.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Give what you would think fair in my shoes. Oh, John Rawls, where is thy sting?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I know how stories like this end. Palace coups, defenstrations, the occasional new King or additional Pope. Perhaps, your men would be more comfortable at home?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: My father, he said 'fight your own fights'. His nose, broken. His ears, cauliflowers. I learned the opposite lesson.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: As always, compagno, a pleasure.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Sfigato! Which is Italian for, 'do come again.'

entry.name: InfiniteCount/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: A necessary parting, indeed.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/FirstContact
entry.value:
Once more, we meet, for the first time.

It is a pleasure to me. To see your face, so young. I have seen you worn, tired, thrilled… but never young.

Ha! Excuse an old man his wanderings. Call me… %1%. In these latter days of mankind, I find I am… a little unmoored. A little adrift in time and space. It does have magnificent benefits… but no-one will take my bets any more.

We'll talk again, I know. Before or after our little wars. Before… the end.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferAlliance
entry.value: Do you dance? When two partners move in lockstep, the tarantella fizzes through our blood, driving out any poisonous suspicion. I would be such a partner…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferGift
entry.value: I feel for you, I truly do. My major domo has put together a package that he assures me will… please you.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: I must hold back a little, you know. Just enough to get by.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: This is a symbol, for now. Of what might come, should our friendship bear fruit.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: Why, after this my cupboards will be bare.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: Do not regift this, I beg of you. This present is unique to you.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: The map is not the territory. It captures certain information, at a certain moment, for a certain intent. But shared, it brings our minds closer together.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: And a moment of amity leads to peace, perhaps. To sleep, perchance to dream?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: Madame, while I share your hunger for blood, I do not share your glee in endlessly indulging it. Perhaps a rest would refresh me?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: My lady, if you will retreat to your ivory tower, I will take myself to my crypt…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Noble sir knight, I know war is your instinct. But perhaps we could put off this duel to another time?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: I am no Macbeth, to be thrilled to war by urgings on a blasted heath. And you are no hags. We can both be better.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Sharp-toothed one, I fancy appeals to your humanity would go awry. Practically, though, there is a time for war and a time to rebuild…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Blood-soaked boy, there are richer pickings elsewhere. And this old man tires of war…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: My castle's high table is set for a banquet… but I would not invite a foe to it. Unless you were willing to change our relations?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: You remember this crossroads? Haha, not the one they tried to bury us at, no. Do you remember the choice we had to make?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: I knew your uncle, you know. As a child, as an old man, and times in-between. I do not think he would have wanted our conflict. Not from ethics, no, but because it is so unprofitable…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: I knew Shelley, you know? The true talent, Mary, I mean. She was fearless, powerful. Perhaps we could talk of her, rather than war?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: I would talk with you, my child. I have many secrets of the world to share, if you will but parlay.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: My friend Polidori said that we cursed ones confined our 'infernal visitations' solely to beings we loved most while upon earth— those bound by ties of kindred and affection. And peace?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: I see old eyes in that young head and worry at the loss of your childhood. But I will not patronise you, I will beg for peace.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: I wonder if my honeyed tongue can trip some switch in your Chinese room, that will move our relations onto friendlier footings?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: There are secrets I have to share… that no man living knows. For a price, of course.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/Praise
entry.value: Ha. Though I knew it was coming, the joy still catches me by surprise.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/Praise/Honorbound
entry.value: Ah, those ties of amity. My curse prevents true closeness, but I can envy your commitment to its form.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/Praise/Trapped
entry.value: It is hard, is it not? I think myself human, but I wonder if I am in any way still that person who fell into the Voice. Your determination to be human is… admirable.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/Praise/WeWhoAreAboutToDie
entry.value: I confess, your broadcasts induce a visceral thrill in me, satisfying a hunger in me I otherwise barely control. Like, uh, professional wrestling.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/PraiseWar
entry.value: Mary wrote, “if I cannot inspire love, I will cause fear!” You are living that dictum, though I hope less monstrously than her creation.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectAlliance
entry.value: I cannot. Not that I do not want to—a deeper peace is always to be desired. I just remember what happens if I do.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Life, although it may only be an accumulation of anguish, is dear to me, and I will defend it.' Dear Mary said that.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: But, my dear! %3% counts me an ally, true to the last! If I must disillusion them so, I would prefer it to be in the dead of night, when we are alone.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: So few friends I have, that to refuse the new hurts me deeply. Yet I cannot. And I cannot explain why.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I would shake them by the hand… but I fear my curse would spread to them so easily. I have memories of such things.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: If you can give so little, then you cannot truly afford to give any. No, keep it, you need it.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: What would I do with your wealth? I cannot take it with me on my peregrinations…

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: I know this world, intimately. I do not need your guidance, however pleasantly offered.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: In my day, when we bartered, we did it without insulting our interlocutor.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: Oh, paying for it? That is quite beyond the pale. No, the faux pas is done, do not apologise.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectPeace
entry.value: “I have love in me the likes of which you can scarcely imagine and rage the likes of which you would not believe. If I cannot satisfy the one, I will indulge the other.” And I thought Mary sweet!

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I cannot! My presence drains my people… sacrifices must be made to protect them from my ageless hunger.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I remember little of the tangled timeline, but this war with %3% was a necessity, if any are to survive.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: You would not want the paltry goods I have to offer. No, better you find aid elsewhere.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: My friend, I respect deeply your concerns for the global economy… but this is my affair.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Oh, no. Poor %3% will quite fade away without my aid. Humanity must stand together, if we are to survive what is to come.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I see through this charade. Let us speak no more of it.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: What do they have to offer me? Rocks? I'd sooner get blood from a stone.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: Would you give such a gift to your mother? No? Then why would you give it to me?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: I am too proud to accept this and too old to change.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: You are mistaken, my old friend. I will not go into the details of how, to avoid embarrassing you.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: That would not be neighbourly. When you are as I am, it pays to retain good relations.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Well, no. I do not think %3% is a worthy target of my ire. Why not fight them yourself, if you feel that way?

entry.name: InfiniteCount/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: I cannot in good conscience keep up this charade. I know I will draw the world's enmity, for walking away from the unity of mankind, but I must.

entry.name: InfiniteCount/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: A shame, but I must look to my own people and their needs.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Time is money, pal.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: My people will draw up the contract.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: I'd better check for an exit clause.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Pity, %3% thought we were heading for a merger. Business breaks weak hearts.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Before I even get into negotations, I need to know who.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Hmm. If we both specialise, this could work. Okay, I'm buying it.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: This had better be a good one. No timewasters.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Ah, my trusted partner. Welcome!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Not sure we have anything to talk about.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Keep it quick.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: So what? Like I give a shi-

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: That'll do.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: Better be worth my time.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: Good to know target markets and, frankly, targets.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: That'll cover my costs.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: Usually negotiate terms before an amount. But willing to make an exception. What'll it cost.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Sure. I can turn a profit, in peace or war. People still buy guns.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Sure. %3% has been a distraction from the real business of business.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I don't know. Our products do well in war, even if our people don't. Who?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptPraise
entry.value: The stock markets tell me how great I am. But, sure, another sycophant doesn't hurt.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: From this, we'll both profit. You've made a wise choice today.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: You idiot. You'll rue the day you walked away from a Daed's deal.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Keep %3% hungry, good idea. They'll be back, on better terms.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Now you're talking my language. Who's on the receiving end?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: I have a new scheme to try and I needed a good mark. They'll do.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Well, I pick my business partners carefully. They have to have… money. Do they?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: We'll cover it, this time. Don't come begging to me again, though.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: This is extortion! I'm impressed, didn't think you had it in you.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Didn't need them there anyway. Your people don't need my… largesse.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptWar
entry.value: So, it's a war economy is it? The arms trade is where the money is.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: My accountants' report on them is… ugh. How much are they spending on marketing?! That's criminal!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: The paperwork would need to line up. For that, I need to know who and their financials.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AdmitDefeat
entry.value:
You think I haven't dealt with a hostile takeover before? You think this is my first time around the rodeo? I know you need me, need the executive with his hands on the levers, the one who makes it all ti-

What? You're cutting me loose? You're terminating my contract? Wait, no, I don't want that kind of severance! I need to talk to my lawyer! You can't-

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AskForProposals
entry.value: Any more fancy ways of wasting my time?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: Look, Anky-baby. Me and you, we get it. But if our relationship is to blossom, I… damn, this is hard to say. I need help.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: Chietess, it is I, Lord Business. I humbly supplicate you to- wait, who wrote this memo? Christ. Look, lady, we need help. Please.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: Machine. I'm sending over a presentation backed by spreadsheets and prospectuses. You'll see that helping us is a smart bet, long-term. And these defrayed assets are a bargain!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/CancelAction
entry.value: Scratch that. Got a better idea.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/Condemn
entry.value: You stop that, pal. Else you and me, we'll have words.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/Condemn/Mysticism
entry.value: Typical mumbo-jumbo, no wonder your research boys defect in droves.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/Condemn/SeeAsISee
entry.value: I see, I saw. Don't get why you think that makes you special. Just a swanky toff like Crowley, yabbering on about deep meaning and not living now.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/Condemn/TenderMinistrations
entry.value: Public healthcare? I dread to think of your bottom line. If the suckers die, get more suckers.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: Wrap your head around this; %3% is bad for you, bad for business.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: That was Uncle Phinnicus's favorite city! The mochachinos there were exceptional—perfectly faux-foamy. Now I have FOMO. Damn you.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: You weren't invited to the meeting. You ain't even a shareholder. BUTT. OUT.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: A trade agreement? Without me? You're trying to undercut me, aren't you?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/CondemnWar
entry.value: Now that's dumb. But if you two nutjobs wanna bang your heads together, I guess I can watch.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: Alien. I just remembered, we never got to give you an old-fashioned human 'welcome to the neighbourhood'. This is how we do it.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: Look, this isn't personal. But you're not a team player so we need to right-size your operation. I think the right size is about… zero.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Hey clippy, just wanted to check in. The hardware audit came back and it says you're better value as scrap. It's nothing personal.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: This isn't personal. But an infinite source of regenerating flesh isn't good business for the global meat market. Least not if someone else owns it. Don't worry, we'll keep you alive. Sort of.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Who's in charge? Larry, Moe or Curly? No, nothing? Not a giggle? Never seen the classics? Philistines, the bunch of you.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Madame, you are a woman after my own heart. Pity it's black as sin or we could have made beautiful monstrosities together. As it is, we can only make war.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Damn, man. Leather, sunglasses, beard. Such unrefined testosterone outside of a boardroom! You make me want to fight you, just to see which alpha ape is dominant.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: You snob. Spit out my coffee, will you? You don't get it, you'll never get it. Sure, the ingredients are crap. But that little squiggle on top, that makes it. That's art, heiny. I'll make you agree.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Don't you sneer at me, old man. I know your marketing and I don't buy it. My boys are gonna find out what's really going on with you.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Cousin, much as I admire your gut, your vim, your taste. There can only be one true heir to Phinnicus. (And if he's not dead, one true person to kill him.) I'll drink a mocchachino to your corpse.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Where's the bottom line in Tennyson? What does Maya Angelou say about profit and loss? You'd be surprised, pal. So I'm going to give you an opportunity to learn. All the heartbreak you can eat.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: Just because you're squatting in the ruins of Uncle Phinnicus' HQ, doesn't make you CEO. That's my business, scum. I'm the boss. ME.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: This is the thing. Your socialism is an unknown factor that I can't control or account for. Which knocks all my quarterly predictions out of whack. Need to eliminate that variable. Which is to say, you.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Get out of the way, kid. Your boss man, this Great Speaker. Me and him need to have a chat, man-to-man.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: You are so damn obsolete and ineffective. Gonna melt you down, strip out the rare earth metals, and make the rest of you into coffee tables. And put my feet up on you.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Pal, you and me, we're the world engine. We're the motors of the economy. 'cept %3% is holding you back, dragging you down. Cut 'em loose.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Looking weak, there pal. Hostile takeover's on the cards. And this market needs players else it becomes a monopoly. Team up with another small fry.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: Seems like a plan. But I don't get out of bed without proof of finance. Show me the money.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: This is going to the moon! Or maybe the sun! Are you in or are you in? You're in, right?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Gimme a bit of baksheesh. And spend ten minutes telling me how great my business cards are.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: You're going to go all-in for me. I don't need your money, but I need to see you want this badly enough.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Wisdom of Solomon, pal. Whatever you got, give me half.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: What are you playing at, amigo? You're in a fight you can't win.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: See, here's the problem. Shopkeepers, the bunch of you, dreaming small. Get better business partners!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: Global economic conditions—and my profit margins—dictate that you find a new business partner. Who ain't me, to be clear.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandTribute
entry.value: Don't see this as a freedom tax. See it as a gift to the guy who keeps the world ticking while you weirdos and aliens kill each other.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: I been working like a dog. Don't give me a dog's dinner—give me the full seven courses.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: I'll give you a discount this time, seeing as you're not completely rancid. You're my pal, after all.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: C'mon. Gimme it all.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: See, what you got in your wallet there? All of that, that'll do.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Back off, buddy. Only I get to service those markets.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: Listen, I'm busy right now, but there's something I need you to handle. As a favor to the Daeds.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Call anytime, pal. I'll be here.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Get outta here, ratbag!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: Mind you don't trip. That first step, it's a doozy.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/FirstContact
entry.value:
Sit down. Time for onboarding.

Background first. Apocalypse, aliens, robots, et cetera. A cyber-utopia. Actually, let's skip these slides.

Here's the important bit. Me! As you can see from this chart, I was brought up to improve this world. My rule is inevitable!

So you should really just knuckle under right now. I can offer you a role in the post room?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferAlliance
entry.value: Friends, I ain't got. Enemies like you… I keep close. A temporary merger would make it closer.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferGift
entry.value: So, me and the board, we put together a package for you. Don't worry, it's not a retirement watch.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: It's a lot, I know, but it's surplus to needs. Don't tell everyone, this is a 'you-only' deal.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: Just a sample of my supply. Stay friendly, there's more where that came from.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: There's plenty more where this came from! No, we're not cleaned out. And if we were… just don't tell Uncle Phinnicus, okay?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: I don't do gifts. But if I did, this would be a mighty fine one.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: Ah, for an hour with Uncle Phinnicus' eye-in-the-sky. All this exploration of what we should already know!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: So that was your Welcome to Earth, pal. Did you get the message?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: Damn, woman. That was an enjoyable tussle. But this is the last Dormeuil suit in the world, I can't risk messing it up. Truce?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Beep-Boop! Machine, deactive war. Turn on peace. Beep-boop. This is how it works for you things, right?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Damn, you're manly. There could be a place for you in my firm, if you can just… step off, a little.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Ladies, all the ladies. No, don't speak—I can't understand a word of it anyway. Can we just agree to… not?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Madame, you are a woman after my own golden heart. It's yours, if we can just walk back from the brink.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Mr Meathead, sir. What would it take for us to walk away? A set of weights? A new carburettor? Name it, it's yours.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: I hear you like treaties, mein herr. After all, treaties mean trade and trade means… cake. Battenberg?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Yo, Drac. Surely you can do the whole bloodsucking maidens thing better if my artillery isn't pounding on your castle?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Now here's someone I can do business with! In calmer times, of course.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Pal, I bet you're getting some damn fine poetry out of this war. But it's dreadful for business. And one day an incendiary's going to land in your library and, poof, it's Alexandria all over again.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: For now, you can have ICAR. But I won't forget.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Mom, I'm done.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Kid, remember that line of jebus, what was it? Blessed are the pacemakers? We could be those guys!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: Look, machine, you and me, we're the same. Two evolutionary algorithms trying to survive in a crazy world. Can't we find common ground?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: I got my hard hat in my bag and I'm ready to break ground on this trade route, right now. Say the word.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/Praise
entry.value: Knew you could handle it. We'll make a true American outta you yet.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/Praise/CultExpansion
entry.value: Now that's how you do a franchise!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/Praise/EngineerLife
entry.value: I don't know what you're putting in the water over there, to make your workers fuck like bunnies, but that's smart. Repopulate the Earth, damn straight!

entry.name: PlatinumScion/Praise/IcarusSatellite
entry.value: Uncle Phinnicus loved that crazy thing, let me come to the launch day. Lifted on a column of fire… then few hours later, another one as it test-fired its weapons. Good days. You treat my girl right, okay?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/PraiseWar
entry.value: If it's a choice between war and peace… what was it Brecht said? 'War feeds its people better.' Gives the world a clear order. Good for business too.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectAlliance
entry.value: Sorry bud, but I just don't have the time for the paperwork.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You don't get to make demands about who I hang with.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Can't do that pal. The world is a better place with %3% in it. Or my world is, at least.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Why don't you give them some company? I'm busy enough.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: You know, I would but… they took their shoes off in the last meeting. That's one of my few red lines.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: And I thought Uncle Phinnicus was cheap. He once gave me a sock for Christmas. One sock. Next one came for my birthday.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: I don't need your stinking money.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: Damn, you really are working hard to bore me to death.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: Chump change. Do I look like a monkey who's gonna dance for cents? Well?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: You won't believe this, but money ain't gonna change my mind on this one.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectPeace
entry.value: You know what the trouble with peace is? No organization, no sense of drive. War… war makes entrepreneurs of us all.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: War is a plan. Maybe it's a plan to kill my enemy, but Uncle Phinnicus said the most important part of any plan is execution.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Fighting %3% brings out the best in my people. I make the best deals, my production lines run on time. Nah, war is good for business.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: The numbers don't make sense. And I won't run them again, you're wasting my time. Is this a trick?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Coming together is the beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.' That was Henry Ford.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Sorry, bud, but %3% is a critical part of the supply chain. Without those components… no more espresso machines. No machines, no mochaccinos. Can you even imagine?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Look, I'm sure you mean well, but I know exactly who I want to trade with and why.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: %3%?! I know what they've got. I have the numbers right here! They don't got shit.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: Greed don't suit you, pal. And it don't work for you.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: You ain't getting diddly squat.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Throw myself into another war on your say-so? Did I get a brick to the head?

entry.name: PlatinumScion/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Y'see, I have plans for %3%. Big plans. Plans you ain't privy to.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: It was never a merger, pal. Just a short-term, zero hours contract. And I'm invoking the break clause.

entry.name: PlatinumScion/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: What do you mean, I'm sending you crap? Never mind the quality, feel the quantity! Ah, screw it, we're done. You'll come crawling back…

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Stop daydreaming. That world's long gone..

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: Together, we have a better chance to secure a future for the human race.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: So now I carry this burden alone? So be it… History will remember my deeds—and your treachery.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Faith? Trust? I shed those things long ago… but this might guarantee the safety of my people, and I will risk it for that.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Today my friend, tomorrow my enemy—and thus mighty empires fall. Who is it that you’re warning me against?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: I don’t trust easily, but I can give this a chance—so long as you’ve also got my back.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I’d never consider it normally, but you’ve proven yourself to me again and again. Who are you vouching for?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Maraheb, it’s good to see you alive and well!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Speak quickly. Why are you calling?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Salam Alikoum. Why do you seek me out today?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: Everyone, literally every damn human, is a critic.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: You delight me. I will treasure this more than words can express!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: How have you survived with your altruism intact? No matter, I will gladly take anything you offer—now how much is it?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: I would gladly accept this. Knowledge is the first step towards understanding, and a lasting peace.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: You’re a true mercenary heart… Take your riches and let’s get on with it.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: Ahh, I see your sense of charity is much like my own. Very well, how much would it take to make this happen?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Yes. I want a future that’s settled by words, not wars. Only that would be worth fighting for at all.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Yes, I’d rather settle things with words anyway… I just thought those days were gone and forgotten.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: The road to peace is littered with thorns, not roses, but perhaps there’s still an amicable path. Who do you have in mind?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptPraise
entry.value: 'Look on my Works, ye Mighty, and despair!' Ha.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: I’ve survived starvation… I’ve seen what it can do to communities. Thank you for the chance to allow both of our people to prosper.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: That seems wise. We had a chance to build a golden road… a shame we paved it with gilded dirt.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: I’ve read the records… Unfortunately, you’re right. Thank you for sparing me further losses.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Maybe. I value my partnerships—so long as they remain equal. Who do you think I have a losing deal with?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: A fantastic choice! Thank you for sharing such a valuable opportunity—one day I hope to repay the favor.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I don’t need my trade partners to be ethical, only fair—now who are you recommending?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: My people can’t afford this, but I lack the strength to deny you. Desperate crimes and starving cries will overrun my cities—and I’ll ensure they all know the cause.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: So this is how you choose to use your strength… I should’ve known that this was your true character. Now how much do you want?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I’ll remove my soldiers—and, believe me, there will be more than words awaiting them as punishment.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptWar
entry.value: Did you think I was all talk? Well I’m a scholar of war, and I’m eager to give you a demonstration of my knowledge.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: And so we march to war. (Sigh…) when did our hearts become as twisted as the outer hellscapes?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: While I might mobilize for ideology, I’d certainly act on opportunity. Do you have a good target?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AdmitDefeat
entry.value:
Ah, so this is how it ends? Fine. I regret… nothing. A beautiful death is a gift. It’s better to burn fast and bright… while trying to help this difficult world. I am not afraid.

Allow me a final indulgence though… Bury me near the ruins of the Musée national so that my grave may join its treasured collection. Someday, perhaps, new students will visit and learn my history…

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AskForProposals
entry.value: There is time, there is time. For the unraveling of plans.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: These are foreign shores to you… but hunger, loss, misery. These are universal. You have your own troubles, I know—but if you have a moment to aid with ours…

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: If there is an iota of humanity remaining to you… search it out now and help us.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: I do not think you have a clear-cased woofer for a head. There is morality, in that evolved clockwork. And my bet is that it can't bear human suffering.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/CancelAction
entry.value: Wait. Life can change when we least expect it—and so I must change my mind.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Condemn
entry.value: 'I was angry with my friend; I told my wrath, my wrath did end. I was angry with my foe: I told it not, my wrath did grow.' Blake.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Condemn/FoundationOfBlood
entry.value: How dare you? What is the point of surviving, when you inflict such horrors on your own? I understand the aesthetic impulse better than most, but in abandoning restraints you abandon taste—and your humanity.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Condemn/Gluttony
entry.value: Ah, the Western disease. Greed, as if money and gluttony can stave off the moment of death. Let me say just this: you will die, aristo, and soon.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Condemn/Immoral
entry.value: Buying your people's love will not work forever. They fear you, they know you regard them as tools to be broken or resources to be consumed. Your day will come.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Condemn/TalesOfTheHunt
entry.value: I pray you become a modern Actaeon, turned from hunter to prey, so you may hear the baying glories of the hounds as deserved horror!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: Lies and the fucking liars who tell them. Go shove your traitorous tongue up your- apologies, poetry sometimes fails me.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: To explain, to a god or alien, why a pacifist should end his days condemning the friendship of his foes… there isn't a lifetime to spare for it.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: The people of what was %3% straggle across the land, prey to beasts and horrors. And, you? You squat in your tower and think it a thing well done, as we edge closer to the brink.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: Quite the modern Iago, you. 'One may smile, and smile, and be a villain.'

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: Scrape our world clean, lay low the forests… just so %3% can cook their rice? I am heartily sick of economics and mercantile greed. Stand alone, pal.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/CondemnWar
entry.value: Should we stand by, while others' houses are bombed? Whilst others are dragged from their beds? Merely because %3% is other? No.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/Anchorite
