entry.value: You not damned for who you are—the dreamer in me loves you for your long life, whilst deploring your lack of true faith. But the realist abhors the destruction you wrought and the dreamer demands retribution for it.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: Survival is not enough, you know. What of flourishing? What of love? What of loss? Our conflict will teach you all these lessons.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: I believe you to be human, to be possessed of a soul, whatever that means—this does not mean we must be allies, or that we cannot differ. Indeed, I find us to be opposed, for now, and that demands war.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: So it has come to this. I will shed tears… not for you, but for the hopes of humanity.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: You will no longer stand in the way of humanity’s future! Read ahead if you wish, but your ending is inevitable!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Your ‘artistry’ is an affront to nature! I will scour the world of all your demented works!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: You hope to be remembered in epics. But we poets do not work to order. After your passing, there will be no laments, no final chapter. Only short, thankful orisons to the lost you killed.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Duty is a fool's concept, to maintain the nobles and kings in their fatted greed. The only true measure of success is happiness, not honor. But I will make these arguments in the field, forcibly.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value:
To see a World in a Grain of Sand
And a Heaven in a Wild Flower
Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand
And Eternity in an hour.' Like Blake, I will capture you. And hold you.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: By the lightning that destroys, by the streams of generous blood shed'… by my country's anthem, I will crush you.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: It is because I love you that we must contend. For both of us the struggle will improve us, make us stronger. Even if one of falls by the wayside, humanity will be the better for it.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: There is a humanity to you that the others lack—a necessity of survival that lets you go where others won't. You have gone too far for me, I know, and war comes—but I still love you for it.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: It is a sorrow for me that your life is no crystal stair. I'm sorry that it's had tacks in it, and splinters, and torn-up boards, and carpetless floors… my sorrow is in adding to your sorrow.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: I do appreciate the rhythm of your statements, the beauty of your prayers, I would have you know that. Yet you lead your flock away from humanity and truth, into horror and error. This I must stop, regretfully.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: Machine, I do wonder. Does it matter if a spirit resides in you or not? Or in me, for that matter. Are appearances enough? This is sophistry, I know, when war is on our doorstep. But it is human to ask.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Shh, listen… Do you wonder where the songbirds are? The predators grow near and I can’t save you alone. You must join forces—quickly, before they encircle us!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: I’m afraid this world isn’t for the kind or the generous. If you want me to do this, then you’ll have to pay me.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Capture my imagination! Offer me untold riches!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: For this request, I’ll only need a symbolic gesture.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: You’re asking for my all, so I’m going to have to ask for everything in return.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: It’s not worth it for me unless you offer a good amount.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Please, you’re both working toward the same thing. End your feud before our true enemies prey on us all!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: War can be fought with trade as well as guns and be just as devastating. Your deal is hurting my people—end it immediately, while peace still exists.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: You can’t survive alone and isolated. You need bonds. If not kinship, then at least diplomacy—and the easiest way to begin is with trade.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandTribute
entry.value: You know, it’s time you give me what I’m due. Think of it as a gift or that I’m apologetic if it’ll help you, but I really need this now.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: I’ve risked so much for you already, only a vast amount seems acceptable.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: I’m just looking for you to make the gesture. A small offering will suffice.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: I’m afraid I must take everything you’ve collected until now. Don’t worry, I won’t use it against you… my goal is to rebuild a good world for humanity.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: You have much that my people lack—surely you can share a fair amount?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: My scouts report trampled fields and looted farms. I’ll choose to see this as vandalism, and not a raid, but you must pull your troops back now.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: I must drown this world in blood in order to resurrect it. I’d bear the stains of war alone, but this time I’m afraid I can’t win without you.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Beslama! May you return to me richer in every way!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Watch what you do… I know I’ll be.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: Beslama, may the day find you well.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/FirstContact
entry.value: Salam Alikoum, stranger. My name is %1%… I was once a teacher, a poet, and a philosopher. Those identities died in the wake of the alien attack, cast aside and forgotten by who I needed to be to survive. Still, I dream of resurrecting the old me—and the old world with it.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferAlliance
entry.value: This hellish world offers no room for fellowship… yet that’s precisely why we must band together. Will you join me and fight for a dream?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferGift
entry.value: To offer you friendship, trust, or loyalty is self-serving… instead I’d like to offer you something more reliable.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: While this amount may seem lavish, I value your well-being far more.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: My gift may be small, but so too is a candle in the darkness.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: This is everything I can possibly offer. All of it. And I’d give you more if it were possible. My dream—no, humanity’s dream—rests on your survival.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: I have begged, scraped, and stolen so that you won’t have to.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: Our old maps are now worthless, and the cost of charting the unknown is paid in lives. Let’s share our maps and spare our vanguards the losses.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace
entry.value: What are we fighting for? Before hatred engraves itself onto our souls, let’s conclude our conflict and focus on preserving humanity.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: I cannot destroy one such as you. You are the repository for your people's wisdom and culture. What would I be?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: Come, we can get to peace. Can you dance? I'll teach you the tango…

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Peace, what a thing to dream of! If you are truly human, you will seize this opportunity—I hope.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: We mustn't do this! We are better than this—humanity is better than this!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Step back from the brink, ladies. We have work to do to save mankind and this squabble is not it.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: I cannot spare the men to punish you for your cruel, indifferent art. But one day, Artificer…

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: I do admire the myth that you are creating—making yourself an archetype, immortal, who will live long after you are forgotten. But even a war story is better with breaks for humanity.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: They called Ludwig III mad, you know, but how many wars did he fight? How many died because of him? None. Funny sort of madness, peace.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Your friend Polidori said, 'the dreams of poets are the realities of life.' I dream of peace. Do you?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Have you learned anything from war? Gained enough? If not, why not try the new?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: This is both sensible and humane—to end this war. You understand, I know. I see it in your eyes.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: I know I can't appeal to your compassion for our people to stop the war—but perhaps you'd recognise how much better our economic ties would be. Think of all the crap you could sell us…!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: If you love your people as I do, you know we cannot continue like this. I beg you, see reason.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: I cannot continue a fight against a child, no matter how misguided, how deluded.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: I do not what thrives behind your social front—a mind and heart like mine, or an alien algorith, bent on continued existence. I suspect the answer may be 'both'—which makes me loathe to contend with you today.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: We both have things the other needs. Rather than steal from each other, why don’t we just trade?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Praise
entry.value: 'I cannot forget a beauty born of slag-dust and human sweat-'

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Praise/LeaveNoManBehind
entry.value: Others will call it profligate, but you have true honour and bravery—you value every one of your people, their lives and their happiness. You pay for it every day, but it is worth it I tell you.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/Praise/WordsOfTheProphet
entry.value: I do not share your faith, but there is poetry in your speech. I could almost be swayed by your prayers. Were not my faith in my people, in humanity.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/PraiseWar
entry.value: Kipling praised war, lost his son to it. Broke him. Though, it seems a just war, I.. I hope you are taking care here. Of the children.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectAlliance
entry.value: Whatever made you believe we had such trust between us? No, I’ve heard all the stories about you—and I’ve even told a few myself.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You have all the authority in defining your own destiny—and none to impose on mine.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I cannot do that. Though my ally may be nightmarish or twisted, I shall always remain true.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: And what happens when our war is won? I know the answer, and I think it’s safer to go it alone.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: No. %3% might fight with us, but they would never fight for us. It’s better to seek other allies.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: I’ve done enough scavenging to know a toxic meal. The amount you’re offering isn’t sweet enough to hide it.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: There’s a riddle in my favorite book… ‘when is a gift not a gift?’ Now, what do you suppose that means? Answer that, and you’ll know why I’m refusing you.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: To know my lands is to know my weaknesses, and I can’t give that knowledge away right now.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: No, I have misjudged you. Greed overtakes your senses. Better I walk this path alone than with a hyena.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: No. This must be done freely if it’s to be worth doing at all.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectPeace
entry.value: I think not. If I show you my back now, you’ll be coming for my throat again.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I’ve always preferred words… but words can fail, mine and now yours, when it comes to matters of survival.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: No, we’ve already come too far. Better to end it here and now than risk birthing a cycle of vengeance.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: No, I’ve studied your impoverished merchants. What would we trade? Debts? Promises? Let’s not even start if all we can exchange are arrears.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I’m sorry, but you lack the resourcefulness to advise me. While you see only deliveries of trash, you forget that I’ve built my army from scraps.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: It appears you don’t know me at all. I would mourn this lost bond more than some lost goods.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Listen before you lead. You don’t understand what I lack, so how can you advise me on what I need?

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I’ve already considered this possibility, but I must decline. There’s neither fortune nor favor left to gain with this one.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: Your greed outstrips your prudence. For this amount, I’d rather see the consequences!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: Tyranny is entitlement, and the foolishness to think it should be acted on. If you choose to persist, then I’ll choose to resist—and this time, with more than words.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: They’re there to keep the peace. Discover your trust, friend, before demanding it from others.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: A wise author once wrote ‘war is what happens when language fails.’ I don’t think communications have broken down yet, so I’d like to keep trying.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I’ve stained my soul to stay alive, but even to me this war seems unjust. Now remove your belligerence from my sight.

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: I once believed that humanitarianism united us… how foolish you’ve proven me! I no longer need your guidance. I walk the night alone, but with clear eyes and clenched fists!

entry.name: PracticalRomantic/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: I once thought my gain would be your success. Was it apathy or avarice that turned your heart?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Could’ve been in and out while you hesitate. Try to keep up!

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: Normally a loner, but you… worthy. Agree to terms—long as you remain useful.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: Thought I was mercenary. Can’t say disappointed… should have seen coming.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Done. What moves we make before they catch on?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Negotiating betrayal. So don’t play coy with victim.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Not a bad deal. At all. Never have enough security.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Depends. Who you brokering deal for?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Connection’s secure. Speak freely. Please.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Connection’s compromised. Keep brief.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Connection’s active. What you want?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: Finished with noise now? Feel better?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Fair price—easily outbid. Send more soon, others definitely will.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: Trying to buy favor? Don’t worry, it's up for sale. How much?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: Agreed. I send over my access codes… Bet I grab yours faster than you send them.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Bargain! Fortunate for us both.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: Fellow contractor. No time for formalities. What your rate?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Yes. Our fight pointless. Greater threats require attention.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Glad. Accept peace. Need to conserve forces for run on ZEPHON.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Just who you representing? Tell me. So I stop questioning your motives.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptPraise
entry.value: Whatever. Didn't do it for you.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: I survived cataclysm on office vending machine food, dry ramen… Happy with deal long as you continue to give me better.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: Alright. Have a long waitlist who want purchase my wares.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Huh. Usually know when a deal’s costing me more than I gain. Thanks for tip.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Slow. Down. Willing to hear you out. All my deals have backdoor. Who you want me to open it to?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Been monitoring their transactions—filthy rich. Was going to make run on their systems, this saves me trouble.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Hmm. Good to know… but I never make a deal unless I see all my partners.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Well. That’s… great. Here you go. Hope you enjoy it.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: Was going to give you gift anyway… what’s on your wishlist?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Alright, don't get tense. Just running military drills.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptWar
entry.value: Whole system rigged. About time it all come crashing down.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: No payment this time. Consider it… debt.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Need help on hit? I’m professional, contracting my services will cost. Now who’s mark?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AdmitDefeat
entry.value:
… outlasted me. Good. You might make it.

Listen—ZEPHON, collective… not what it seems… satellite intercepted transmission, logs. All a trap… Not first time… must… bring it down… down… must-

entry.name: RogueOperative/AskForProposals
entry.value: What else. Not enough?

entry.name: RogueOperative/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: Mr God-bother. Need stuff, keep folks alive. Too proud to beg. Me asking, shows how serious.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: Fool to ask for something for nothing. You know, I know. But asking all the same.

entry.name: RogueOperative/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: Need help. What you want to help? Don't have it, total charity-case, but might do, one day.

entry.name: RogueOperative/CancelAction
entry.value: Don’t think being honest with me. Start over.

entry.name: RogueOperative/Condemn
entry.value: Damn fool choice. Smarts missing with this one.

entry.name: RogueOperative/Condemn/EconomiesOfScale
entry.value: Crap. You make crap. Too fast, falls apart. Dumbass.

entry.name: RogueOperative/Condemn/TenderMinistrations
entry.value: Ugh, humiliating. Gonna lick pal's wounds? Stroke hair next. Where respect? Where safety? Good friends don't turn backs on other.

entry.name: RogueOperative/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: Caught! Liar, liar, liar. Soon only robots like you. And only cause they told to.

entry.name: RogueOperative/Condemn/WordsOfTheProphet
entry.value: Fancy talk. Empty words. Why you do this? Lies about other heavens, alien afterlives. Live now, not tomorrow.

entry.name: RogueOperative/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: Friendship? You? Make me laugh. You friends with power, money, magic. %3%? Doesn't know what's coming.

entry.name: RogueOperative/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: Damn! Lucky ICAR shareholders are all dead or I'd be in shit. Lotta good people in %3%. Get you for this.

entry.name: RogueOperative/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: Smart. Understandable. But still tearing up your discount card. Don't screw me unless I ASK you to.

entry.name: RogueOperative/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: History. Great network of swaps, gifts, trades. Didn't stop wars. Not going to stop me.

entry.name: RogueOperative/CondemnWar
entry.value: Your war with %3%. Stupid. Waste of time. And blew up the favourite, best dumpling spot.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: Millennia, you lived. Should have been smarter. Seen me—seen this—coming! Stupid to trust again.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: Broke your security, saw private files. Monster! War is best option, for everyone.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: You already know, see it in your sensors. The trojans I've unleashed, the hackcode overwhelming your processors, DDOS… time for war, dear.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Don't need to kill you. Power die, lights fail, ventilation offline, bunker doors seal. Who cares if you live in there? No threat.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Don't pretend to understand you. Weirdos, witches. Easier to remove than grok. Bye.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Nice gadgets, nice look. Pity AIs are better humans than you. Can't trust you, have to kill you. Sorry, not sorry.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Satellite sees. Scramblers built, troops gathered, artillery facing my way. New front line formed. So will beat you to it. War it is.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Can relate to honor! Don't have it, of course, but understand. Politely telling you, formal like. War coming.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Hard to pin down. Satellite sees you here, there, many places. Caitiffs… bear your blood? No idea what you are, gotta get rid.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Just business, you get that? Yeah? Hate you too, sure, but this just business.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Can care too much? Work too much for others? Survive, first, romantic, survive! Then help.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: Well, we both know where we're at. Hack and counter-hack. War had to happen. Both too good, too nosy, too similar to not fight.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: No point saying boohoo, no offence. About to invade, kill your people. Mealymouths cry apologies. I know what I'm doing.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: What worse than mad god? Mad kid who thinks he's god. Bad for business. Will make it quick, kid.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: Polymorphic code tough to crack. When all other hacks have failed, always brute force.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Bad news… cracked files from one of your ‘allies’. Discovered plans to betray you. Withdraw forces protecting them before you’re ambushed.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Don’t be a fool, join now—greater enemies to face in future.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: Got better offers pending… But I like you. Tell you how this works.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Don’t want the others to know on your side. So include a high premium as cover.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Just add small bonus and will lock you in.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Only way this look legit is if you give me everything. Everything you’ve saved. Trust me, still getting a bargain.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Include moderate premium and will accept this time.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Warring with a good-good client of mine. Could you stop fighting as a favor. To me?

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Profit requires opportunity, and I’ve got best one for you—but first you need to stop trade with my enemy.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: Expert on crashing systems, economic ones included. Crisis is trending for you—preventable, if you integrate with this trade partner.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandTribute
entry.value: Network virus going around, stealing confidential info and crashing file systems. Offering my services—but not for free.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Can monitor your net traffic, but it’ll require most of my attention—and my time very expensive.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Can protect your computers—for a minimal fee.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Never seen a system with more vulnerabilities. Securing this going to cost you all materials you’ve secured.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Can secure your network—for a moderate fee.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Your troops suspiciously close. Think I wouldn’t notice? Can’t surprise a security expert.

entry.name: RogueOperative/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: Big score opportunity—perimeter’s breached, network’s jammed, troops in disarray. You in? … Bet I snag more than you.

entry.name: RogueOperative/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Be watching your back.

entry.name: RogueOperative/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Security hard to maintain. Careful with your access.

entry.name: RogueOperative/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: Come back when you need a deal.

entry.name: RogueOperative/FirstContact
entry.value:
Ni hao, foe. Glad to see war doesn't stop commerce. I'm %1%, computer security and tech specialist. My reputation…? Well, actually better than stories.

Preparing a run on a system called ZEPHON. If I can gain access, I can jack into central OS—will be grateful to anyone who helps me.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferAlliance
entry.value: Offering you an exclusive contract. Mutual protection, long as we both wish. You accept?

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferGift
entry.value: Helping me a lot lately. Can’t give augs or secrets, but it’s only right that you be paid.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: Might seem like a lot, but helped me earn a major score. You deserve this.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: A small amount, but just the beginning.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: Don’t know it, but you saved my life. Here’s everything in my vaults—and that’s just a start.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: Here. Not a great amount, but can’t afford any more.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: You need better intel. I need find ZEPHON’s bunkers. Share our maps?

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace
entry.value: While we fight, ZEPHON continues strengthen itself. Put aside differences and focus on true enemy.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: Acrin, humans, weirdass machine craziness—all just want to survive. War waste of time.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: Know you like killing. But waste of time, Acrin and wardens to kill. Steal from my people, better idea?

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Maybe war was… mistake? Happy to back off, find other target for grift.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: You don't want war! I don't want war! Why we fight?

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Which one I talk to? Who in charge? Deal is: stop fighting, I stop fighting. Everyone happy! Well, not you three, you miserable. But everyone else!

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: Look, war is mistake. Messes up your pretty plans. How about stop, forget. Not worth asking to forgive.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Peace. Or nuke from space. Not bluff, try me.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Have treaty here, found in old drive. ICAR and you, no fight. Well, I run ICAR corp now. So stop fighting!

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Don't get you. Weird, old white guy. Don't care. Try peace.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: I got ICAR. Make you mad. Destroy me, I destroy it. Try me.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Okay, okay. Call off soldiers, I call off crazy giant satellite. Deal?

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: Respect! Never hacked to standstill before. Stop before we destroy each other completely?

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Hmph. Must have something you want. Other than dead soldiers. Though could sell them too?

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Kid. Need to stop war. Crimping sales. Give life discount if you stop.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: Can't breach firewalls. Not giving up. Moment of respite, that's all.

entry.name: RogueOperative/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: A business partner just met an unfortunate end. Means there’s an opening for you now—interested?

entry.name: RogueOperative/Praise
entry.value: Hmm. Did well. What, you want pat on head? Hm.

entry.name: RogueOperative/Praise/Gluttony
entry.value: Luxury, riches. Not just for you, but your followers too. Makes life worth living, yes?

entry.name: RogueOperative/Praise/Restless
entry.value: Wise. Soldiers in cities messy. Steal, fight, smash. Kick them out, profit.

entry.name: RogueOperative/Praise/SurvivalTraining
entry.value: Hands on training, you give. Wise. The more who learn from you, the better chance we all have for survival.

entry.name: RogueOperative/PraiseWar
entry.value: Good. That one deserves killing. Destroy factories too, reduces competition. Good for business!

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectAlliance
entry.value: Can’t do this right now. Being surveilled by my enemies, so accepting this would only put you in danger.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Not right now. Give me some time. When discussing betrayal, the preparations need to be perfect.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Need more time to work them. Just imagine their face when you make your move and I’m nowhere to be found.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Would be offering more threats than security right now. Let me deal with my problems first, then we can discuss this.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Would normally consider it—but not with them. Trust me, got insider intel.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: … This it? I’m flattered, but it’s not worth my time. Only contact me when you have real business.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: Taking this would compromise my integrity… I’ll let you know when the others stop watching.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: Sorry, my map contains too much sensitive info.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: Can’t do it for so little. While I’d love to help you save face, if I offer you a discount then everyone’s going to demand one.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: Can’t, your enemies include some of my most important clients. Improve your affairs and I’ll reconsider.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectPeace
entry.value: Once I start a job, I always finish it. But I’ll admit something to you… this time it’s personal.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: There’s a secret reason why I have to see this through. I can’t say any more right now—but trust me, it’s important that you stay out of this.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Why are you helping a faction that plans to betray you? Seen their encrypted comms—trust me, we’ll all be better off without them.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: Got too many commitments already. I’ll add you to the waiting list though.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: Taken me ages to vet my clients. They’re all trustworthy and generous—and with the way things are going, can’t afford to lose any of them.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: No, they’re still a valued client. Between you and me though—if they were to somehow be weakened, then I’ll reconsider.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: My augs, my terms—no middlemen. If they want a deal, then they need to negotiate with me directly.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I must decline their business. If you knew what I knew about them, then you’d be on guard.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: That’s not too much, just need some time to get it all together. Will contact you when it’s collected.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: I’ll let you save face this time. Try to blackmail me again, and you’ll find out just how much I’ve gotten from your systems.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Sorry, trying to communicate with them but I think the signal’s jammed. Just wait—they’ll move on their own eventually.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: There’s a Chinese proverb that says—‘it’s good to strike the serpent’s head with your enemy’s hand.’ Won’t participate until I’m sure who’s who here.

entry.name: RogueOperative/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Parents had a saying—‘if you strike first, you admit you have no other ideas’. There’re still other options here.

entry.name: RogueOperative/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: Ending our defense pact. It’s nothing personal though—with me, it’s never personal.

entry.name: RogueOperative/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: Sorry, but you’re not buying enough. Can’t afford to keep this slot reserved for you.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Perhaps you should make up your mind before you start talking?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: The pleasure of having more friends around. I'll have to bake more cookies.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: Oh, that's a shame. Just when we were getting along so… nicely. Not that I wasn't expecting it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Ah, of course. It hurts a little to say goodbye, but I can see that you think it's the right thing. How is it, being so sure of yourself?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I don't know about this. Friends are near family, you understand? Who were you thinking of?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: It's fascinating, your presumptive insight into %3%'s feelings. Let's see if they agree.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: More friends for little old me. And you don't think the tentacles will put them off?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Well, hello you! Your visits are welcomely… predictable.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Don't worry about your reputation. You have something to say.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Come in, stranger! Well, not stranger than me.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: If I did something wrong, I did for it the children.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Now isn't that a treat? Let me give you cupcakes to take back with you.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: That would be a kindness. Keep the little ones safe for a few more days. But is it enough?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: Of course you were here for that. Consider it already shared.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Would it bake your noodle if I said that was the number I wanted?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: All this haggling and bargaining. When I already know the number we're going to settle on.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Cute, but not too bright. Good that you came to your senses.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: If you're sure. Their sentiments always seemed so contrary.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Well, I don't know. Some folks are mistaken, some are bad to the bone. Which one you here for?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptPraise
entry.value: See. Kindness isn't that hard. Even, with all this.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: From each according to their ability… from me, sweet Canuck delights. From you, whatever you can dredge out of the wastelands.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: Now that isn't very… neighbourly. Shame, I'll have to keep my secret poutine recipe to myself.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: They're cheating us? Your intuition is, as ever, otherworldly. But if you're sure, you're sure.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Stop your blather and slow down. I profess to understand home economics better than macro or micro…

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Those numbers make sense, though for the sake of humility I should profess that this simple science is beyond me.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: They say that it always pays to know your dancing partner before you agree to a spin. So who?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Stolen out of the mouths of babes… I hope you enjoy it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: You sure you want this, instead of a sweet apple pie or two?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Oh, my dear. I must not have realised I'd left them there. Of course, I'll make a show of calling them back straight away.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptWar
entry.value: Hurt a hair on a child's head and I will make you regret this until your dying day. And chase you into hell for good measure.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: War is never good, when there are better methods of destruction. But if it has to be someone, it'd better be them.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Well, I'm not sure. War isn't good for anyone. Yet, long-term, it's better than giving the aggressor their head. Who has itchy knuckles?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AdmitDefeat
entry.value:
Well, it appears I am done with all this elegant doublespeak. The Voice is pulling me back in. Feels like it did before, each time we passed through. I wish there was a sensation of finality to it—to know this was a cessation.

Anyway, can you do me one more favor? Make sure that the kids don't suffer. Either take them in or- Well. You know.

Now end it. Let me go. Whatever is beyond the veil waits.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AskForProposals
entry.value: Was there something else?

entry.name: TwistedMother/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: Grampus, could you help out? We're struggling over here just to keep the little ones out of the snack jar. I don't want them to realise that it's empty…

entry.name: TwistedMother/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: My little nippers worship you, you know? You're a big strong woman who professes to know her own mind. If you gave us some help, well, that would drive them crazy.

entry.name: TwistedMother/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: Well hello, big Mr Z. I'm not sure if there's anyone in there really listening, but we could sure use your help about now. Perhaps the evolved algorithm will favor us?

entry.name: TwistedMother/CancelAction
entry.value: Oops. Look at me. Practically cross-eyed with confusion!

entry.name: TwistedMother/Condemn
entry.value: Even when you do the wrong thing… do you have to be so cruel, with it?

entry.name: TwistedMother/Condemn/FoundationOfBlood
entry.value: You're looking for perfection and this is how you behave? Perfection don't come from cutting away weakness—it comes from the human heart, from throwing your arms around the weakest.

entry.name: TwistedMother/Condemn/TalesOfTheHunt
entry.value: You big old tyrant, you. Showing off your muscles and your silky black hair and how fine you are at killing. That won't win you love or respect.

entry.name: TwistedMother/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: Now, wait for a moment. If you must lie, learn to make it subtle. Word of brutal lies spreads very quickly. I make sure of it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: You and %3%? Really? Really, really? Well, alright then. I have seen stranger matches under these strange stars. But this is like a mongoose and a snake…

entry.name: TwistedMother/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: I'm not talking to you right now. We have refugees from %3% at our gates. Just… go away. I don't have the energy to mince my words.

entry.name: TwistedMother/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: If you'd just talked to me instead of going behind my back… I would have rejected it in unequivocal language. And we would have understood one another more clearly.

entry.name: TwistedMother/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: You guys, trading? %3% and you? Like the world's worst children at the worst lemonade stand. Oh, no, I'm laughing just thinking about it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/CondemnWar
entry.value: My mother always said 'don't stand between an idiot and their fate'. So I won't. I just feel sorry for all the innocents you're dragging down with you.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: Grampus, I know you resisted your tribe's crimes, as best you could. But it wasn't enough. So you had this coming.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: Sister, you've done many dark and unkind things. But I told you that fruit pie was cooling and wasn't ready to eat. And you stole it anyway! That's just unforgivable.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Prissy miss %3%. Don't think I missed those times you looked down your nose at me and my… shape. I'm still more human than you ever will be. And I'll prove it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: Soldier, soldier, won't you die for me?

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Your intentions are as tangled as your thoughts, your believed destiny. But even so, their average has been tending to the hostile. So I will meet them with this, with war.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: The great industrialists, scientists, leaders always speak of sacrifice in the pursuit of perfection. Odd, though, that they are never the ones sacrificed, whilst children are sent under the looms. Well, dear, it's your turn.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: You profess yourself a free spirit. But you care little for those who travel with you, those who fall under your juggernaut's wheels en route. I think it's time someone taught you to care.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: My dear, I cannot but admire your professed honor. But I cannot accept that so many are outside of your moral bounds. That you grow large at their expense. I aim to reclaim on their behalf.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: How do you stay in there? What my short sojourns do to me… yet you squat in there, like an octopus in a hole, shapeless monster waiting to burst forth. Gotta root you out, before you turn me into a poet too!

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Not going to justify myself to you, boy. Run along now.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: Ah, the arbiter of moral compromise. See the tattooed tear on your cheek, whilst you exterminate another enemy. Let us bring you to the table by force, hypocrite.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: Dear heart, there is no such thing as an individual alone. Our self, our identity is found in society. You will understand that as your allies abandon you…

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: Looking into this mirror, darkly… should I admit myself stirred? By the infoldings, the crenellations, the ooze. How can I be disturbed by myself?

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Oh, child. You are so far fallen from the sweet cherub you should be. If only force will bring you to your senses, so be it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: I know what you are. What dark machinations move at your core. The Acrin were mistaken in their aim, but not in their method. Destroying you would be a service.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: Few things push a person out of good society faster than a bad friend. Step away, before they drag you down too.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Let me have a look at you. You look lean, worn. In need of a good friend.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: I'd like to help, really I would. But a sign of trust would be welcome.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: I don't need your money. But I do need you to show this matters to you.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Show me a symbol. Of good faith or of belief.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: Strip your cupboard bare. Empty your stores. Keep the clothes on your back, though.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Half. Half will do.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Asking you is as important as your agreement. So I'll ask. Sue for peace, please. Our world will be better off for it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: The trade feels good, doesn't it? But you know it's not right. That you shouldn't.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: There's a vulnerability, in sharing. That's important in itself—opening yourself up, tying yourself back to humanity.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandTribute
entry.value: Being part of a community means sharing. Means giving when asked. Or when told to. And I'm telling you now.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Our relationship needs heavy rebalancing.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: We don't need much. More of a sign of goodwill, really.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: You understand, this isn't about us. It's about the next generation, the kids. And they deserve everything we can give them.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Sharing between equals should be equal. So split what you have.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: Let's play a game. I'll pretend that this isn't a threat. And you pretend that you didn't mean for your soldiers to be there.

entry.name: TwistedMother/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: Knowing who's a friend and who's a foe? Now, that's hard. Why not take some friendly advice? We can pretend it's impartial, if you like.

entry.name: TwistedMother/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Next time, I'll bake biscuits.

entry.name: TwistedMother/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Go now, you're scaring the kids.

entry.name: TwistedMother/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: Don't you have places to be?

entry.name: TwistedMother/FirstContact
entry.value:
Well, don't just stare. Pick your jaw off the floor and remember your manners.

I know that I don't look all '… me' anymore. Part wholesome homemaker, part transdimensional terror. Though we all get that way some mornings, eh?

Let me look after mine, gather them into my arms, and I'll be a good neighbor. You wouldn't like my bad side.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferAlliance
entry.value: Standing arm-in-arm against the darkness? Bit hokey, I know. But sometimes, yes, we are clichés and we have to lean into it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferGift
entry.value: Me and the kids were thinking about you. Got you something together.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: We had to hold back just a little—to stay alive, you know.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: Not much, but it's the thought that counts.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: We've given all we can. We hope you do the right thing.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: We can manage without this. Just about, anyway.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: Gold? Diamonds? Information is a mother's best friend.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: Yes, your kind drove me to this—to what I am. But I can't blame you. Can you forgive me too?

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: I'd appeal to your better nature, but I'm not sure you have one. I can promise you, fighting other people will be more fun.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: It'd be trite to say 'we're the same, you and I'. We are obviously not, separated by metaphysics and ethics. But I don't think war comes naturally to either of us.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: I know the kind of man you are. Not one to refuse an outstretched hand, a white flag.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: You three must understand community. Mutual support? Why would you fight us, then? All we want is to be left alone.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: If you're chasing perfection, I can see why you'd want to destroy me. And I won't appeal to your humanity. But perhaps there are bigger threats to your immoral dream?

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Your road doesn't lead this way, boy. Drive your armies to me and your journey ends here. Back off and you'll carry on riding, for a time.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: At your time of life, you want war? Rather than a nice fire in that big old castle hearth? You need to give yourself a good talking-to.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Boy, you need a real woman to lick you into shape.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: 'She came home running, back to the mothering blackness… ' You're not the only one who knows poetry here, rhymer. Be friends and I'll send more.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: Lonely little girl. Why do you have to fight the world? There's kitchens out here, with soup, dumplings, treats. Just stop for a moment and see.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Now you, you should understand my position.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Child. I know you gotta show face. But maybe a rest from the rhetoric would do you good.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferPeace/Zephon
entry.value: You already read my emails. You know I don't want war. So drop it.

entry.name: TwistedMother/OfferTradeAgreement
entry.value: Two fools propped together. But we can make it work?

entry.name: TwistedMother/Praise
entry.value: Oh, sometimes you make me quite swell with pride!

entry.name: TwistedMother/Praise/CostOfConviction
entry.value: It's right, what you do. Spending time with your people. Whether it's cynical or not, they think you care. And their feelings are all that count.

entry.name: TwistedMother/Praise/HeartfeltLoss
entry.value: Under your pragmatism, you've a kind heart and your followers know it. I can't stop it hurting. But know that I know.

entry.name: TwistedMother/Praise/WhispersOfTheVoice
entry.value: You hear it too, I know. Must be nice to have someone to talk to about it. The kids, they just don't understand.

entry.name: TwistedMother/PraiseWar
entry.value: Do I like it? No. But do I understand why it's necessary? Damn, yes.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectAlliance
entry.value: I'm sorry. It's not you, it's me. Can we wait until I know you better?

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I do not have so many friends that I would let any of them go.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: That would be a cruelty to poor %3%. I'm not so far gone that I can cause another's anguish, just like that.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: My mother always told me not to talk to strangers. Though I guess that I'm the tall, dark one now.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectAllianceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I do know them. I understand them a little better. But I do think they would make a good… friend.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectGift/RejectAmount
entry.value: If you're going to go to the effort of calling, try to make it worth our while.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectGift/RejectOutright
entry.value: Hon, don't be a fool. Keep it for a friend.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectMapSharing
entry.value: But sweetie. Don't you want to enjoy the surprise?

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectAmount
entry.value: My… apologies. That's too high for me to do it. Do you know the cost of babysitters in the apocalypse?

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectPaymentForDeal/RejectOutright
entry.value: I do have other priorities, you know? Than running your errands.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectPeace
entry.value: We shouldn't. Someday, you'll thank me for this.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: You know, not everyone is destined to survive this mess. Choices have to be made.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectPeaceWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Peace, with them? Have you seen the messages they've been sending?

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectTradeAgreement
entry.value: No. I can barely keep track of who's doing what.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I'm afraid I'm not in the mood for this chat. Let alone telling these traders that they're not wanted.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: Oh, hell no. I need the stuff they're sending.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: I can't take any more stuff. So materialistic!

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I don't need their help. And they're not getting anything from me.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectTribute/RejectAmount
entry.value: I can't do that. I'd rather annoy you and yours than starve the kids.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectTribute/RejectOutright
entry.value: You wouldn't be making the mistake of… threatening me. Would ya? Think hard before you answer.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I'm sorry, this line is breaking up. My helpers are happy to negotiate on the battlefield, though.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectOutright
entry.value: More fighting? Aren't you sick of it? Such a sad cycle.

entry.name: TwistedMother/RejectWarAgainstThirdParty/RejectParty
entry.value: I am not so gullible as to do your dirty work. %3% warned me about you.

entry.name: TwistedMother/TerminateAlliance
entry.value: Friend, I don't think we need this formality. Let's rejoice in our freedom of action!

entry.name: TwistedMother/TerminateTradeAgreement
entry.value: Let's put this order on hold for now. We can come back to it another day.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptActionCancel
entry.value: Our lives are fleeting. Even a child knows not to waste time.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptAlliance
entry.value: Our armies already march in the same direction, to walk beside each other is merely a formality.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptAllianceTermination
entry.value: I thought of us as brothers, bound by a calling more powerful than blood. While this saddens me, go with grace, and know that I will pray for you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: … It is as you say. While I can forgive them for their trespasses against me, I will not suffer it on behalf of those I protect.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I always see the best in others, it is my strength and my burden. Help me safeguard my pastures, point out the wolf prowling amongst the lambs.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: The world would be a paradise if we would all just listen to each other. Sí, I will do my part—thank you for this budding connection.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptAllianceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Whether it be my message or my age, there are too many who trade wisdom for fear. I would be grateful if you found me a willing listener.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptCall/Friendly
entry.value: Behold! I prayed, and here you are!

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptCall/Hostile
entry.value: Bendición. Have you come with open ears and an open mind?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptCall/Neutral
entry.value: Bendición. Have you come to consult or to confess?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptCondemn
entry.value: I do right by those I follow, those I lead. Who could do more?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptGift/AcceptAmount
entry.value: My people thank you. To give freely, to give without intent—I remain in awe of your benevolence.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptGift/AskAmount
entry.value: Those who give earnestly only grow richer. How much are you donating today?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptMapSharing
entry.value: The Great Speaker invites all eyes and ears—behold their glorious kingdom, and marvel!

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Take it and let us be done. It saddens me that greed is your greatest calling.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptPaymentForDeal/AskAmount
entry.value: You seek to profit from my darkest hour… how much would you bleed me?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptPeace
entry.value: Violence cannot solve violence, only understanding can. Let us silence our guns and let the voices be heard.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Paradise cannot be built atop bones and flesh. May this peace become its new bedrock.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptPeaceWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: Hatred is a poison that festers in the spirit. Who should we mend ties with?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptPraise
entry.value: But, of course. I am the instrument of one greater.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTradeAgreement
entry.value: What my neighbor gives me, I shall repay double—so may our union remain ever fruitful.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTradeAgreementTermination
entry.value: Your avarice corrupts all that you are. I can tolerate it no further.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Sí. My caravans also feel that their work is no longer holy. Today, their pilgrimage ends.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: There is a limit to wealth, but not to greed. Who deserves my censure?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: An enlightened recommendation. My caravans will begin their pilgrimage immediately.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTradeAgreementWithThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: The wealth I offer goes beyond coin. Who deserves enrichment?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTribute/AcceptAmount
entry.value: Take this and be satisfied. I will pray tonight for your humanity.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTribute/AskAmount
entry.value: So you reveal yourself as the monster at last. How much will it take to stave off your hunger?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: My followers trespassed on your lands. Please, grant them forgiveness, and know that I and the Great Speaker will admonish them.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptWar
entry.value: I prayed and the Great Speaker answered—let there be no peace for the wicked, let there be no quarter for the nullifidian!

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AcceptParty
entry.value: Ahh, can you hear the Speaker’s words? It reveals this world to be a crucible and you have delivered my next test.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AcceptWarAgainstThirdParty/AskParty
entry.value: I would not start a crusade without just cause. Does someone offend the Great Speaker?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AdmitDefeat
entry.value:
Is this victory? No. It is simply martyring a child. The Great Speaker’s message still spreads and cannot be stopped. As many of us as can die as my vanquishers want—but you cannot kill truth.

And you? Do you not realize your own defeat? While my mortal trials end here, you remain in this hell. And when my body becomes a lifeless husk, my soul will be liberated like a butterfly from a chrysalis, rising toward heaven.

So… free me…

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AskForProposals
entry.value: Ask, child. Something still troubles your heart.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AskForSupport/Anchorite
entry.value: You are estranged from your god, I know. But the Great Speaker loves you, as he loves all creation. Cross our palm with silver and a blessing shall be yours.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AskForSupport/Chieftess
entry.value: Can I convince you that there are greater riches than survival and pleasure? That there is a glorious afterlife waiting, if only you will donate to the one true church?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/AskForSupport/Zephon
entry.value: The Great Speaker knows even the heart of a soulless machine. And it knows that you are ready to give!

entry.name: UntoldProphet/CancelAction
entry.value: The wise knows not only when to start, but when to start over.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/Condemn
entry.value: You know He rues the day you were born. From his mouths, curses fall.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/Condemn/Augmentations
entry.value: Those things you plug into your body—the Great Speaker condemns those, trinkets in the face of his awesome power. Let them go or you will never see his face.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/Condemn/HordeMandate
entry.value: I repudiate your false crusade! You call them together, to move as one, with great vigor. Yet no holy spirit motivates them, no betterment of mankind! Only base lusts abhorrent to the Great Speaker…

entry.name: UntoldProphet/Condemn/Independent
entry.value: Independence is a road to loneliness—to solitude. Those who stand alone will never know the truths of the Great Speaker.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/Condemn/Untrustworthy
entry.value: We are all judged eventually. And, yes, perjury is not the worst of sins. But it is sufficient for eternity to be uncomfortably hot and restless.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/CondemnAlliance
entry.value: Spirits swirl about me, whispering The Great Speaker's truths. It knows the void at the heart of your happy friendship. Poor, poor %3%.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/CondemnCityDestruction
entry.value: At the fall of %3%, an angelic trumpet blasted and the walls tumbled down. The people lamented. When you fall, however, I will ensure that you are unmourned.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/CondemnInterferenceAttempt
entry.value: Lesser angels tell me of your heresy, your betrayal. Here, take your silver.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/CondemnTradeAgreement
entry.value: Do you cross %3% hands with the wealth of iniquity? It does not diminish me. Only you and they.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/CondemnWar
entry.value: %3% is chosen of the Great One. To war upon them… why not raise your hand against the Gods themselves? Judgement will fall either way.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/Anchorite
entry.value: Choose your heresy: to have traveled for millennia across the stars for a godless crusade; or to have abandoned the faith of your forefathers because you were tested and failed. Either way, punishment is your lot.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/Chieftess
entry.value: Apostate. You may glory in your heresy, but the Great Speaker knows. Through me, their prophet, they condemn thee.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/EmulatedMind
entry.value: The Great Speaker has declared thee 'abomination', unwholesome to his eye and to his flock. We abhor thee.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/FallenSoldier
entry.value: There is a difference between us. You wage war, secure in your immortality. I wage war knowing that if I fall, I go to a better place. Your curse is to remain here, forever.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: True prayer comes from the heart… but for you, I have only anathema.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: In my dreams, I see you as you desire to be: the Great Speaker shows you as a shell of magnesium and pearlescence, gleaming, smooth curves… and utterly empty. Fill yourself with hate, for war comes.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Majestic… you are majestic. The curved arm, the flowing locks, the easy smile. Seductive whispers, but not of the Speaker. I must deliver myself from temptation, deliver evil to you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: Materialism will not let you enter into the kingdom of heaven, no matter how many coins you pile upon your eyes, the ferryman will not take one such as thee. Fall at the Speaker's base, as them for clemency.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Devil, I call you! Devil, with your pale smile! Devil, thrice, Devil, cursed of the Great Speaker!

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Only those of faith will enter the Kingdom. And faith can never take root in such poor soil.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: You are nearest in temperament to myself; all prophets needs must be poets too. Yet that foul humanism of yours has no place in advanced, religious culture. We shall burn it out of you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/RogueOperative
entry.value: I have no quarrel with you. I barely know who you are or what you stand for. But cease desecrating our holy skies with ICAR's satellites lest heaven truly falls on us.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/TwistedMother
entry.value: Witch. I will not spend curses on you. You will merely burn.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Though we hear the same voice, only I listen. Otherwise, you would already know what fate it whispers for you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DeclareWar/Zephon
entry.value: Machine, we will end you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandAllianceTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: You congregate with one who seeks harm to the Great Speaker. Purge their corrupting influences immediately, before it spreads to you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandAllianceWithThirdParty
entry.value: Do not surround yourself with such skepticism. Extend your hand, open your heart and you will discover a kindred spirit.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandPaymentForDeal
entry.value: A moment, please… I have consulted with the Great Speaker—and they demand a tithe.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: Only a great donation will make them agreeable to the matter we discussed.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: They say a token is all that is needed. Will you make the gesture?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: A wealthy warlord once gave up everything they had, and soon found their fortune returned and doubled. Have faith that a greater reward lies at the end of this path.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandPaymentForDeal/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Your donation does not need to be grand, but it does need to be substantial.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandPeaceWithThirdParty
entry.value: War is a raging wildfire that hungers to burn down all forests. It is better to extinguish such flames, and warm your people with faith instead.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandTradeAgreementTerminationWithThirdParty
entry.value: You focus too much on the material. Severe your bonds of greed before your depravity leads to ruin.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandTradeAgreementWithThirdParty
entry.value: Frugality in excess is also a vice. Consider the prosperity to your people that may arise from partnering with an equally pious soul.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandTribute
entry.value: I have wept and I have counseled, yet you remained steadfast… and now you have angered the Great Speaker.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandTribute/DemandHighAmount
entry.value: You will not like this… only a vast sum can prevent vast suffering for our peoples now.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandTribute/DemandLowAmount
entry.value: Disaster can still be averted, if you would only donate a few alms.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandTribute/DemandMaxAmount
entry.value: You did not heed me before, but heed me now—sacrifice everything, any lesser beneficence will fail to appease their wrath!

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandTribute/DemandMediumAmount
entry.value: Quickly, give a modest act of charity, before it is too late.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandTroopWithdrawal
entry.value: I heard the distant thunder rumbling across the valleys and wondered about the cloudless skies. Now I know it is your forces, and not rain clouds, that gather at my steppe. Withdraw them immediately before a true storm engulfs us.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/DemandWarAgainstThirdParty
entry.value: Do you hear the cheers and glad gatherings? The Great Speaker has called for a crusade—will you join our righteous cause?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/EndCall/Friendly
entry.value: Go with grace.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/EndCall/Hostile
entry.value: Much suffering could be averted if only you would listen. Farewell.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/EndCall/Neutral
entry.value: Heed your inner voice, it tells you the path to salvation.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/FirstContact
entry.value:
Bendición, enemy warrior. I am %1%. While I am young, only a child’s mind knows that it is not this world that is twisted, but rather how our misguided hearts perceive it.

Indeed, I am but a simple herald for the Great Speaker. I tell my people what the universe desires, and they choose to listen. And so our empire grows.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferAlliance
entry.value: We have been united in faith and spirit, and now it is time to take the next step. Your flesh is now my flesh. Your blood is now my blood. Any who rend and bleed us will suffer double our wrath!

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferGift
entry.value: Even in trying times, your faith remained unshakeable. The Great Speaker recognizes this and offers a reward.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferGift/OfferHighAmount
entry.value: Do not be alarmed by such a large sum, for the true gifts of the Great Speaker are manifold.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferGift/OfferLowAmount
entry.value: Do not be disheartened by the amount. It is but the beginning, if you will only stay the course.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferGift/OfferMaxAmount
entry.value: Mind. Body. Soul. You believed and gave everything to the Great Speaker. Here is your reward.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferGift/OfferMediumAmount
entry.value: A modest reward… perfect for such a pious being.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferMapSharing
entry.value: The lands are there for all people—human and otherwise. I am happy to share my knowledge of them with you, if you would do the same in exchange.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace
entry.value: Do you not hear how the world laments our foolishness? Peace cannot be forced through violence. Let us withdraw our armies and begin to talk again.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/Anchorite
entry.value: Be glad we have not destroyed you already.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/Chieftess
entry.value: Fie. A crusade against you has no purpose—there is no glory in it, nor converts.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/EmulatedMind
entry.value: Perhaps my declarations of heresy were… premature. I'm sure the Great Speaker has a place in his creation for one such as… you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/FallenSoldier
entry.value: The Great Speaker has come to me and told me of his dreams—and you feature in them, unharmed. I cannot afford to fight you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/FurtiveTribunal
entry.value: Our crusade is done. We will come back for you, one day, I swear.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/HeartlessArtificer
entry.value: The Great Speaker has chosen to preserve you. Perhaps because of your beauty-of-holiness in your creations. More likely there was a worse threat…

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/HollowWarlord
entry.value: Mighty warrior, the Great Speaker wishes to offer your clemency. A moment of peace and your crusade will renew, against other targets, it is foretold!

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/HonorableAristocrat
entry.value: The Great Speaker repents of his aggression towards you—a mistake, of undue fervour. (And the sweets you sent were yummy.)

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/InfiniteCount
entry.value: Are you a prophet too? A minor one, I mean, no true interlocutor of the Great Speaker. We should commune…

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/PlatinumScion
entry.value: Mammon and the sins of avarice are so… clichéd. Repent, join my side, and the Great Speaker will forgive you.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/PracticalRomantic
entry.value: The Great Speaker approves of your oratory, Romantic. It would be a waste to lose you in war.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/RogueOperative
entry.value: Pax! Pax! I see that somehow our sacred e-texts have been corrupted, with heretical changes to the wording. I will happily sign a treaty if the culpable party could change them back..?

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/TwistedMother
entry.value: Perhaps I misinterpreted the scriptures. Perhaps you are not a signifier of the end of days.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/UntoldProphet
entry.value: Your Speaker is silent. The Voice is silent. Humility is silent. Whilst in your mind howls only your mind. Take the time to heal it.

entry.name: UntoldProphet/OfferPeace/Zephon
